title: Amaxhoba okuxhatshazwa ngokwesondo abuyiselwa isidima
author: Noluthando Motswai
text:
Isithethi seSebe uLesemang Matuka uthi ngaphambili abantu abangamaxhoba kwakunyanzeleka ukuba bahambe imigama emide ukuze bafumane ezi nkonzo. Eli ziko liza kunceda abantu baseKatlehong, Thokoza, Vosloorus kunye nemima ndla engqongileyo.
“Njengesebe, sifuna ukuba kubekho iinkonzo zezempilo ezingcono ezifunyanwa ngu mntu wonke ngokuqeqesha nokuxhobisa ngezakhono iingcali zezonyango ezi nezakhono zokuncenda amaxhoba olwaphu-lo-mthetho. Kule minyaka mithathu idlulileyo, iingcali zezonyango ezili-106 zifunde zaphumelela izifundo ze-Se-xual Assault Care Practitioner Course.” Uthi isebe liza kuqhubeka ukusebenzisana nemibutho engekho phantsi kukarhululemente (ii-NGO) kunye namanye amahlakani ancedisa ngokuthuthuzela amaxhoba ngokwengqondo ligxininisa kakhulu eku-thinteleni ukuxhatshazwa kunokuqwalasela kakhulu kumonakalo owenzeka emva kokuxhatshazwa.
Amaziko iThuthuzela Care Centre amiselwa ukuba aphucule indlela amatyala okudlwengulwa nokuxha tshazwa ngokwesondo athathwa ngayo. Amaxhoba ala manyala ngoku ancedwa ngendlela enesidima futhi kwiindawo enenkathalo.
La maziko aphantsi kwe Gunyabantu lezoTshutshiso (i-NPA) lisebenzisana neSebe lezeMpilo, eloPhuhliso loluNtu kunye nelezobu-Lungisa nokuPhuhliswa koMgaqo-siseko, kwakunye noMbutho wamaPolisa oMzantsi Afrika (i-SAPS).
Kukho amaziko asixhenxe eGauteng. Elokuqala lavu-lwa eChris Hani Baragwanath Hospital ngowama-2000.
UGq Efadzwa Tipoy, umpha thi omkhulu wezonya ngo ophethe iSinakekelwe Thuthuzela Care Centre, ucebisa abantu ukuba ba-xele kwabasemagunyeni ngokukhawulelza xa bethe bangamaxhoba okuxhatsha-zwa ngokwesondo.
“La maziko anika abantu amayeza okuthintela izifo ezosulela ngokulalalana  (ii-STD) eziquka isifo sokudumba kwesibindi (i-Hepatitis B) kunye ne-HIV . Abantu abangamaxhoba bani kwa neepilisi zokuthintela ukumitha. Musa ukuhlamba. Yiza nezi mpahla ubuzinxi bile uzisongele ngephepha, ungazifaki kwiplastiki,” utshilo uGq Tipoy.
Wongeze wathi, ukususela oko kwavulwa eli ziko linyukile inani labantu abase-benzisa iinkonzo zalo futhi nabantu babuyiselwe isidima njengoko ngoku zikhona neendawo zokuba bahlambe emva kokuba bexilongiwe.
Enye yeengxaki le klinikhi esajongene nazo kukuba abantu abangamaxhoba beza apha sele kugqithe ixesha elide – kubalulekile ukuba ubungqina buqokelelwe fu-thi namayeza anikwe ixhoba zingadlulanga iiyure ezinga-ma-72 emva kokuhlaselwa.

title: Vuka uzilwele, xela kwabasemagunyeni izenzo zokudlwengulwa
author: Adele Schormann
text:
Isithethi samapolisa sephondo laseMpumalanga uColonel Mtsholi Bhembe uthi kuba-lulekile ukuba uluntu lusebenzisane namapolisa luzizise ngaphambili ezi zenzo zolwaphulo-mthetho.
"Njengemapolisa, ngumse benzi wethu ukuqinisekisa ukuba abenzi bobubi baziswa ngaphambili nokuba amaxhoba afumana unakelelo olune-nkathalo. Siyabacela abantu ukuba bawaxele kwizikhululo zamapolisa ezikufutshane nabo amatyala okudlwengulwa,” utshilo uBhembe.
Amaxhoba kufuneka awax ele kwabasemagunyeni amatyala anxulumene nokuxhatshazwa ngokwesondo singaphelanga isithuba esiziyure ezingama-72 emva kokuba ehlaselwe.
UBhembe ucebisa amaxhoba okudlwengulwa ukuba afune uncedo lweengcali zokuthuthuzela nokucebisa umntu owenzakele emphefumlweni xa bethe bangamaxhoba eli nyala.
"Ungaziva uzonyanya ufune ukuzihlamba uphinda-phinda futhi ude woyike nokuphuma ngaphandle ubonwe ngabantu.
Zonke ezi zinto ziqhelekile. Kodwa kufuneka ukhumbule ukuba zikhona iinkonzo ezilungiselelwe ukunceda wena,” utshilo.
I-Greater Rape Intervention Project (GRIP) yeminyeyemibutho enceda amaxho ba odlwengulo ukuba aye kuhlolela iNtsholongwane kaGawulayo noGawulayo (i-HIV/Aids) nezinye izifo.
Unontlalontle osebenzela i-GRIP uThandiwe Maseko uthi lo mbutho unceda amaxhoba okudlwengulwa.
"Amaxhoba siwanceda  ngeenkonzo zonakekelo futhi siwanike nendawo yokuhlala efanelekileyo ade akulungele ukuthetha. Sineengcali ezinenkathalo neziwaziyo umse benzi wazo ezinceda amaxho ba,” utshilo.E
Indlela yokuvula ityala lokudlwengulwa emapoliseni:
■ Qala ngokuya eklinikhi uyoxilongwa. Ingxelo yoxilongo iza kuba yinxalenye yeli tyala uza kulivula futhi iza kunceda amapolisa akwazi ukubamba umenzi wobubi.
■ Emva koko ungaya kwisikhululo samapolisa esikufutshane nawe uvule ityala. Ipolisa liza kufuna ulinike iinkcukacha zakho futhi uchaze nokuba kwenzeke ntoni. Phendula ngokunyanisekileyo futhi uqinisekise ukuba akukho nto uyishiyelelayo. Ukuvula ityala nokubalisa kwakhona le ntlungu kungabuhlungu, kodwa kufuneka wazi ukuba ezi nkcukacha ziza kunceda kuphando lwabecuphi.
■ Cela inombolo yomnxeba yomcuphi, ukuze ukwazi ukumtsalela umnxeba uqonde ukuba ityala liqhuba njani. Umcuphi naye uza kutsalela umnxeba ukuba kukho ezinye iinkcukacha azifunayo.

title: Masisebenzisane silwe ukuba ungafiki umhl’omkhulu wokuphela kwamanzi
author: More Matshediso
text:
Ngokutsho kwe-DWS iimvula khange zine ngokwaneleyo fu thi amanzi ayashokoxeka ema-damini.
Oku kubangele ukuba urhulumente abeke imigqaliselo engqingqwa enkinkisha ukusetyenziswa kwamanzi ngelinge lokuba umhl’omkhulu woku-tsha kwamadama nokuphela kwamanzi ungafiki.
IsiXeko saseKapa ngoku sisebenzisa imigqaliselo ekwinqa naba 6B. Oku kuthetha ukuba umntu omnye, nokuba use-msebenzini, ekhaya, esikolweni okanye nakweyiphi indawo uvumeleke ukuba asebenzise amanzi azilitha ezingama-50 okanye ngaphantsi ngosuku.
Nangona isixeko sisenza konke okusemandleni ukulwa ukuba ungafiki omhla omkhulu  wokuphela kwamanzi kodwa sithi silungiselela ukufika kwimeko apho sikwaziyo ukonga ama-nzi aqhube kude kufike iimvula zobusika.
“Siza kuzivala iimpompo xa umthamo wamadama ethu ufikelela kwi-13.5%. Wakuba umthamo wamadama ufikelele ku-13.5%, isixeko siza kuyivala imibhobho emikhulu yokuhambisa amanzi, ivulwe kuphela kwiindawo zo-shishino nakumanye amaziko abalulekileyo afana nezibhedlela,” sitshilo isixeko kwingxelo ebesiyikhuphile. Xa sifikilele kwesi sigaba, abahlali amanzi baza kuwafumana kwiindawo ezithile eziza kuwankinkisha eziza kuba kuso sonke isixeko. Umhlali ngamnye uza kufumana amanzi azilitha ezingama-25 ngosuku.
Isixeko sizivulile iingcango zeZiko lemiSebenzi yeeNtlekele (i-DOC) ukuze ibe lilo elijo-ngene nesiCwangciso seNtlekele yaManzi. Esi sisicwangciso siza kuqala ukusebenza xa amadama esitsha neempompo zamanzi zivalwa.
Izitsala-manziIsixeko siyabacela abantu uku ba bangazisebenzisi kakhulu izitsala-manzi ezingaphandle ezindlini. Isixeko sithi  ukunkcenkceshela kufuneka kwenziwe isithuba esiyiyure enye futhi oku kwenziwe ngooLwezibini nangeMigqibelo kuphela, phambi kwentsimbi yesithoba kusasa nasemva kweyesithandathu emva kwemini.
Amanzi asetyenziswa sisitsa la-manzi neempompo yesitsa la-manzi kufuneka ankinkishwe alinganiswe uze umyinge osetyenzisiweyo ubhalwe phantsi futhi kufuneka babe nazo ezi nkcukacha xa kufike amagosa kamasipala ezokuhlola,” sitshilo isixeko.
Songeze sathi abahlali kufu -neka bafumane imvume kwi-DWS ukuba bafuna ukuthenga okanye ukuthengisa amanzi aphuma kwizitsala-manzi.
Njengenxalenye yamalinge karhulumente okulawula indlela asetyenziswa ngayo amanzi, i-DWS ibeke imiqathango engqingqwa ukwenzela ukuba imigqaliselo ebekiweyo yokusetyenziswa kwamanzi ithotyelwe.
Isixeko sikwasebenzisana nee-arhente zogcino-mthetho kunye neCandelo loPhando eliKhethekileyo ukuze kunya-nziliswe uluntu ukuba lithobele le miqathango.
Ukuthatha amanyathelo okulwa abarhanelwa Kutsha nje isebe liqhube ugqogqo oluqubulisileyo libambisene nesixeko. Olu gqogqo belijoliswe kwiziganeko zolwaphulo-mthetho olunxulumene namanzi Emfuleni.
Eli phulo lilungiselelwe ukulwa nabo bangathobeli le mithetho ikhoyo yezamanzi nokuba kulandelwe le migqa-liselo ikhoyo yezamanzi, kwaye liza kugxininisa kakhulu kwiindawo zokuhlamba iimoto ezingabhaliswanga ngokusesi-kweni.
“Ngokwemimiselo yemiqathango yenqanaba 6B, amanzi atyiwayo kamasipala awafena-langa kusetyenziselwa ukuhlamba iimoto. Iindawo ezi-ngabhaliswanga zokuhlamba iimoto zisebenzisa amanzi amaninzi. Abanikazi bamashishini okuhlamba iimoto basebenzisa amathumbu ama-nzi, bona abanye basebenzisa amanzi eempompo zabo,” isebe litshilo.
Nangona ekhona amagosa amaninzi ezamanzi ancedisa kwidabi lokuba singade sifikelele kumhl’omkhulu wokoma kweempompo, isixeko sihlaba ikhwelo nakubahlali ukuba nabo badlale eyabo indima bonge amanzi.
“Sicela bonke abahlali ukuba bathathe inxaxheba kumalinge esiXeko saseKapa,” utshilo uSekela-Sodolophu wesiXeko saseKapa u-Ian Neilson.

Amacetyana okonga amanzi  
•	 Yivale	impompo	xa	uxukuxa,	utsheva 	okanye	uhlamba	izandla.
•	 Ungathathi	ixesha	kwishawa	futhi 	usebenzise	amanzi	amancinci	xa	uhlamba 	ebhafini.
•	 Ungawathengi	la	manzi	athengiswa 	ezivenkileni.
Imoto
•	 Xa	uhlamba	imoto 	yakho	sebenzisa 	ibhakhethi 	nesiphontshi	 kuphela.
Kwindlu yangasese
•	 Hlamba	ngeshawa	endaweni 	yokuhlambela	ebhafini
•	 Abantwana	bahlambe 	ngaxeshanye,	kunye.
•	 Gungxula	kuphela	xa	kukho 	imfuneko
•	 Faka	isitena	kwitankana	lamanzi 	lendlu	yangasese	ukuze	unciphise 	indlela	eliwasebenzisa	ngayo 	amanzi.
Ekhitshini
•	Yivale	isinki	xa	uhlamba	izitya, 	ungazihlambi	impompo 	ivuliwe
•	 Ungayifaki	kakhulu 	isepha,	ukulungisela 	ukuba	kungabiko 	mfuneko	yokupula
•	 Yivale	isinki	xa	uhlamba 	imifuno,	ungayihlambi 	impompo	ivulilwe	amanzi 	ebaleka.
•	 Nkcenkceshela	iintyatyambo	ngamanzi 	obuhlamba	ngawo	iziqhamo	nemifuno.
Iintyatyambo nesitiya
•	 Nkcenkceshela	izityalo	xa	sele	kupholile
•	 Nkcenkceshela	izityalo	ngalaa	manzi 	ubuhlamba	ngawo	iziqhamo	nemifuno
•	 Esitiyeni	sebenzisa	izichumisi	zendalo 	ezinganazikhemikhaliAbantu	bayacelwa	ukuba 	basebenzise	isilinganisi-manzi	(i-meter)	ukukhangela 	ukuba	akukho	ndawo 	zivuzayo	na.
Funda	isilanganisimanzi	phambi	kokuba 	siphele	isithuba	esiziyure	ezimbini	nasemva 	kwaso,	amanzi	engasetyenziswanga. 	Ukuba	umthamo	wamanzi	asetyenzisiweyo 	utshitshile	kwisilinganisi-manzi,	lo	nto	ithetha 	ukuba	ikhona	indawo	evuzayo.
Abahlali	bayacelwa	ukuba	bazilungise 	iimpompo	ezivuzayo.	Iimpompo	evuza 	ithontsi	ngomzuzwana	ilahla	amanzi	azilitha 	ezingama-10	220	ngonyaka.
Yintoni imbalela?  Imbalela sisibetho sendalo esihambelana nemozulu.
Singathwaxa imimandla emikhulu iinyanga ezininzi okanye iminyaka kwaye siyayichaphazela imveliso yokutya, kwaye inciphisa iminyaka eyimilinganiselo ephilwa ngabantu kunye nendlela oluqhuba ngayo uqoqosho lwemimandla emikhulu ukanti kwamanye amaxesha ikhe igubungele ilizwe lonke.
Indlela yokuvula ityala lokudlwengulwa emapoliseni:
■ Qala ngokuya eklinikhi uyoxilongwa. Ingxelo yoxilongo iza kuba yinxalenye yeli tyala uza kulivula futhi iza kunceda amapolisa akwazi ukubamba umenzi wobubi.
■ Emva koko ungaya kwisikhululo samapolisa esikufutshane nawe uvule ityala. Ipolisa liza kufuna ulinike iinkcukacha zakho futhi uchaze nokuba kwenzeke ntoni. Phendula ngokunyanisekileyo futhi uqinisekise ukuba akukho nto uyishiyelelayo. Ukuvula ityala nokubalisa kwakhona le ntlungu kungabuhlungu, kodwa kufuneka wazi ukuba ezi nkcukacha ziza kunceda kuphando lwabecuphi.
■ Cela inombolo yomnxeba yomcuphi, ukuze ukwazi ukumtsalela umnxeba uqonde ukuba ityala liqhuba njani. Umcuphi naye uza kutsalela umnxeba ukuba kukho ezinye iinkcukacha azifunayo.

title: Ukubhalisela uvoto kuza kuba ngeyoKwi ndla yowama-2018
author: More Matshediso
text:
IGosa eliyiNtloko loNyulo lekomishoni, uSy Mama bolo, uthe zonke izikhu lulo zovoto ezingama-22 612 ziza kuvula ngempela veki yomhla we-10  nowe-11 kweyoKwindla yowama-2018 ukususela ngentsimbi ye-8 kusasa ukuya kweye-5 emva kwemini. Oku kwenzelwa okokuba kube lula kwaye kuncede abavoti bahlaziye iinkcukacha zabo zovoto okanye ba bhalise. Okokuba ufudukele kwenye indawo engeyiyo le wawuhlala kuyo ukugqibela kwakho ukuvota, kufune ka uphinde ubhalise kwesi sithili sakho sitsha sovoto.  Abemi boMzantsi Afrika abaminyaka ili-16 nangaphezulu  nabanesazisi esi semthethweni okanye  ikhadi bangabhalisela uvoto. Okokuba  akubhalisanga, aku sayi kuvunyelwa okokuba uvote ngowama-2019.
Abavoti ababhalisileyo abaneenkcukacha zeedilesi zabo ezingekhoyo kumqulu woluhlu lwabavoti, iinkcu kacha ezifunekayo bangazi nikezela kwizikhululo zabo zovoto xa kubhaliswa.
“Sifuna abavoti beze baze basebenzise eli thuba,”  utshilo uMamabolo. “IKomi shoni yoNyulo kungoku nje ayikabinazo nangoku iidilesi zabavoti abamalunga nezigidi ezi-2.8. Ngaphezu koko kukho iidilesi ezizigidi ezi-3.5 ezihlelwe “njengezi ngagqibekanga” okanye “ezi ngacacanga.” Olu didi lufuna ukuphinda luhlahlelwe ukuqinisekisa okokuba ngaba zikho na ezinye iinkcukacha ezikhoyo,” wongeze ngeli tshoyo.
Ikomishoni ifumene iidile si ngokusebenzisa amali nge awohlukeneyo aquka ukuhlaziya iingxelo, iifayi li neendawo zokulondolo za izibhalo ezibalulekileyo. Oku ikwenzela ukukhangela nokufumana iidilesi ezinikezelwe ngabavoti kwimi nyaka engama-20 edluleyo; ngexesha iqokelela iidilesi ngexesha lonyulo loomasipala lowama-2016; nangokwe nza uphando lwangapha ndle ngaphambi kweempe laveki zokubhalisela unyulo lovalo-sikhewu.
Apho kuyimfuneko khona, abavoti ekufumaniseke okokuba babhaliswe kwizithi li zovoto ezingachanekanga, basuswa apho ngokweCa ndelo 12 (1)(d) loMthetho woNyulo.
“Siye safumana saze sasebenzisa, imithombo yeedi lesi ekwamanye  amacande lo ombuso afana neZiko lee Nkcukacha-manani loMza ntsi Afrika (i-Statistics South Africa), i-Arhente yeZibonelelo zezeNtlalo noMhla la-phantsi yoMzantsi Afrika (i-SASSA), u-Telkom, iPosi yoMzantsi Afrika neSebe leMicimbi yaseKhaya, apho sikwaziyo khona,  ” utshilo.
vBhalisa phambi kweyoKwindla yowama-2018  KweyeDwarha yowama-2017 iKomishoni yoNyulo yenze iwebhusayithi ethi:www.elections.org.za isenzela abavoti ababhalisiweyo abane-intanethi ukuze bahlaziye baze banikezele ngeedilesi zabo, okanye, banikezele ngeedilesi zabo.
Kanti ke abavoti banako nokutsalela umnxeba iZiko loNxibelelwano kule nombolo: 0800 11 8000 ukususela ngoMvulo ukuya kuLwesihlanu ngamaxesha omsebenzi. Oku bangakwenza xa befuna uncedo malunga nalapho sikhoyo isikhululo sabo sovoto nezinye izinto abafuna ukuziqonda.Abavoti ababhalisileyo basenako nokuthumela iinombolo zabo zeZazisi ngeSMS kwinombolo ethi 32810 ukuze bafumane i-SMS eneedilesi zezikhululo zabo zovoto (i-SMS ibiza i-R1)Ekufanele ukuba ukuphatheXa utyelela isikhululo sakho sovoto phatha incwadi yakho yeSazisi enebha khowudi, iSazisi esilikhadi okanye isiqinisekiso sethutyana seSazisi. Uza kuncediswa ekuzaliseni ifomu yokubhalisa ethi iqulathe iinkcukacha zedilesi yalapho uhlala khona. Loo nto iza kunceda ikomishoni ukuba ikubeke kwisikhululo sovoto esichanekileyo. Ubungqina balapho uhlala khona ABUFUNEKI nganto.
UMamabolo umemelele bonke abantu, imibutho yezopolitiko, imibutho yoluntu, imibutho engekho phantsi korhulumente, amatshantliziyo, amajelo eendaba, iinkokheli zemveli nemibutho yezenkolo ukuba iqinisekise ngokuba le mpelaveki yovoto ibe yimpumelelo.

title: Sindisa imikhombe yeli
author: More Matshediso
text:
Le ngxelo, equka ikota yokugqibela yowama-2017, ibonisa inkqubela ekuba njweni kwabantu abaliqela, uphando nempumelelo eku gwetyweni  kwabo bazinge la imikhombe ngokungekho mthethweni, nabathengisa  iimpondo zayo ngokungekho mthethweni nokuhla kanci nci kwenani lemikhombe ezingelwa ngokungekho mthethweni esizweni jike-lele kowama-2017 (1028), xa kuthelekiswa nowama-2016 (1054).
Ngowama-2017 kubanjwe iimpondo zemikhombe izihla ndlo ezisibhozo kwiSikhu lulo seNqwelo-moya seZi zwe-ngezizwe i-OR Tambo International Airport kwaza kwabanjwa abatyholwa abangama-502 ngokuzingela imikhombe ngokungekho mthethweni nabatyholwa ngokurhweba ngokungekho mthethweni abali-16. Lilonke inani lababanjwayo ngama-518, nani elo elihle livela kuma-680 kowama-2016.
“Ngelishwa, amagosa ethu angama-21 nawo abanjwa malunga nemicimbi enxulu mene nokuzingela imikho mbe ngokungekho mthethwe ni kowama-2017,” utshilo uMphathiswa Molewa.Ukuthintela ukuzingelwa kwemikhombe ngokungekho mthethweni  Urhulumente namahlakani akhe basungule amanyathelo ngamanyathelo okuthintela ukuzingelwa kwemikhombe ngokungekho mthethweni, kuquka iinkqubo zokubeka esweni ngokuhambahamba kwiipaka zesizwe nokuse benzisa ubuchwepheshe obukwiqondo eliphezulu.Phakathi kwenyanga  yoMqungu neyoMnga  yowama-2017 kuzingelwe imikhombe engama-504 ngokungekho mthethweni eKruger National Park (KNP). Loo nto yenze ukuba inani lihle ngeepesenti ezingama-24 xa kuthelekiswa nama-662 kowama-2016.“Ngenxa yecebo lethu lokulwa ukuzingelwa kwemikhombe ngokungekho mthethweni e-KNP sibona lisihla inani lokuzingelwa kwemikhombe ngokunge-kho mthethweni. Yimikhombe engama-2662 eyaziwayo ezingelwe ngokungekho mthethweni kowama-2017 xa kuthelekiswa nengama-2883 kowama-2016. Loo nto ithi oku kuzingelwa kuhle nge-7.6 yeepesenti,” uqinisekisile uMphathiswa.Kambe, inani lemikhombe ezingelwe ngokungekho mthethweni linyukile Kwazulu-Natal, eMntla Koloni, eMpumalanga, eFreyistata naseMntla Ntshona.
Ifuthe kuqoqoshoUkuzingelwa kwemikhombe ngokungekho mthethweni nokurhweba ngezilwanyana zasendle okungekho mthe thweni kunefuthe elibi ekuphuhliseni uqoqosho lwelizwe nokudala imi sebenzi, kuquka noku phuhliswa koqoqosho lwezilwanyana nezityalo ezahlukeneyo okubandaka nya necandelo lezokhe nketho.“Ukuphela kwezinye zeentlo bo zezilwanyana zasendle eziyimbalasane eMzantsi Afrika ezifana nomkhombe, oyinxalenye ‘yeZona ziLwa nyana ziKhulu ziHlanu’ ezibizwa “i-Big Five,” kunga nefuthe elibi kwinani laba khenkethi abatyelela uMza ntsi Afrika. Uninzi lwabakhe nkethi lutyelela uMzantsi  Afrika kuba lufuna ukubona le Big Five ukutsho ke umkho mbe, ingonyama, inyathi, ihlosi nendlovu,” iSebe lezeNdalo litshilo kwingxelo eliyikhuphileyo.Ukuzingelwa kwemikhombe ngokungekho mthethweni kubonwa njengento eyingozi kukhuseleko lwelizwe, nto leyo enganefuthe kwinani labakhenkethi abatyelela eli lizwe, kwaye urhulumente ukubhengeze njengolwaphulo-mthetho oluphambili esizweni.Izenzo ezingekho mthethweni ezihambelana nokuzingelwa kwemikhombe ngokungekho mthethweni nokurhweba ngeempondo zemikhombe okungekho mthethweni kunceda kuphela inani elincinci labophuli-mthetho.“La maqela abophuli-mthetho axhaphaza uku ntsonkotha kolu hlobo lolwa phulo-mthetho. Ngeli xesha le mibutho yemigulukudu ifumana ukuxhamla, urhulumente akakwazi ukuqinise kisa uphuhliso lwezentlalo noqoqosho kwaye ezi zenzo ziyondela ebantwini elizweni liphela,” iSebe liqinisekise latsho.

title: I-MISA yanceda ingcali yezokwakhiwa kweedolophi
author: More Matshediso
text:
Ungomnye wabantu aba xhamla kwi-Arhente yeNkxa so kaMasipala yeziSeko zezi Bonelelo (i-MISA) yeNkqubo yeziThwala-zidanga eziTsha. I-MISA yinkqubo ezamela izi thwala-zidanga amathu ba emisebenzi nawokufu mana uqeqesho ngomse benzi usemsebenzi ni kwiinkalo ezifunekayo zobugcisa ukuze zibhaliswe njengeengcali.
I-MISA licandelo lika rhulumente kazwelonke eliyinxenye yeSebe loLawulo lweNtsebe nziswano. Yasekwa ngekaCa nzibe ngowama-2012.
“Emva kokuphumelela iba nga le-12 ngowama-2008, nda nyanzeleka ukuba ndibe nonyaka endingabhali swanga ndawo kuwo ukuze ndicebe indlela endiza kuyi hlawula ngayo iimali zase yunivesithi,” watsho uMu khodiwa.
Ngowama-2010, wabhalisa kwiYunivesithi yaseRhawu tini kodwa ingxaki yema li zange imvumele ukuba awugqibe unyaka wokuqala wakhe waze wanyanzeleka ukuba asiyeke isikolo.
Kunyaka olandelayo, wabhalisela izifu ndo zeN3 kwi-Ele-ctrical Engineering kwikholeji ya lapha kodwa wakhawuleza waqonda ukuba ezo zifundo azilobizo lwakhe. Waphinda waqalisa ukuthumela izicelo kwiiyunivesithi ngethemba lokufumana inkxaso-mali yokufunda.
Ngethamsanqa, iYunivesithi yaseVenda yasamkela isicelo sakhe waze waqalisa ngesiDanga kwi-Urban and Regional Planning  ngowama-2012.
“IsiKimu sikaZwelonke so Ncedo lwabaFundi nge Mali yokuFunda (i-NSFAS) sandihlawulela izifundo zam zonyaka wokuqala yaza i-MISA yandinika ibhasari xa bendisenza u nyaka wam wesibini ya ndixhasa ngolo hlobo ndade ndazigqiba izifundo zam ngowama-2016,” watsho.
Ibhasari yahlawula zonke iindleko zakhe zemfundo, kuquka ukuhlohlwa, iincwadi, indawo yokuhlala noku tya.
Ngo-2017 uMukhodi wa waqalisa ngengqesho yoqhelaniso nomsebe nzi kuMasipala weNgingqi wasePrince Albert kwiSebe leeNkonzo zemiSebe nzi yeSebe nezoLuntu.
“Akunakuze ushiywe lixe sha ekufikeni apho ufuna ukuba khona ebomini. Kufuneka wenze konke okuse mandleni akho ukuguqula iimeko okuzo ngokunjalo uphucule iimeko ophila kuzo,” utshilo uMukho diwa.
Inkqubo yeziThwala-zida nga eziTsha i-MI SA ngoku inezithwa la-zidanga ezingama-70, kuquka iingcali zokucwa ngcisa nokwakhiwa kweedo lophu neengingqi ezinga ma-31, iinjineli zombane ezi ngama-24, iinjineli zezokwa kha ezili-12 kunye nee ngcali zezokwakha na baphathi beeprojekthi  abathathu. Bonke bakoo masipala kuwo onke amapho ndo alithoba njengenxenye yenkqubo.
Intloko yesiGqeba esiLa wulayo (i-CEO) eliBambela ye-MISA uNtandazo Vimba uthe i-ofisi yakhe iyakuqo-nda ukuba kukho ingxaki enkulu yokunqongophala kweengcali ezinezakhono zobunjineli nezokwakha eMzantsi Afrika.
“Asifuni kuphela abantu abatsha abaneziqiniseki so zemfundo kwezi  zifundo, kodwa sifuna  ukuqinisekisa ukuba bafumana uqeqesho oluku mgangatho wehlabathi ji kelele kwaye bazingcali ezi bhalisiweyo,” watsho uVi mba.
“Oomasipala banengxa ki enkulu yokunqo ngaphala kweengca li ezinezakhono eziku mgangatho ophezulu.  Sinoxanduva olukhu lu lokuqinisekisa ukuba oomasipala banabasebe nzi abazingcali ezineza khono ezikumgangatho  ophezulu, ngokusebenzi sa amalinge ethu oku xhobisa abasebenzi ngeza khono,” uqokele watsho.


Abazali baza kuzibalula kunyulo lwee-SGB

ABAZAlI BANEthuBA lokudlala indima ephambili kulawulo lwezikolo zikarhulumente ngenjongo yokuphucula umgangatho wokusebenza nokwenza isikolo sibe yindawo ephucukileyo yabantwana babo.

unyulo lwamaqu mrhu olawula  lwesikolo (i-SGB) luza kubanjwa ngeyo Kwindla kwaye abaza li bayathundezwa ukuba bathathe inxaxheba ukuze babandakanyeke kwimfu ndo yabantwana babo.
Unyulo luza kwenziwa kuzo zonke izikolo zika rhulumente kulo lonke eli lizwe.
UMphathiswa weMfu ndo esiSiseko u-Angie  Motshekga uthe olu lelona nyulo lukhulu kweli lizwe, ngaphandle konyulo luka rhulumente weengingqi (oo masipala) nolukazwelonke.
“Unyulo lwee-SGB lwe nza ukuba uluntu nabahla li bazive beyinxalenye fu thi benesabelo kwimfundo yabantwana. Umgangatho wokusebenza wezikolo  ukholisa ukuphucuka xa abazali bezibandakanya ngenkuthalo nangomdla kwimicimbi yesikolo.”Uthe ii-SGB zinendima enkulu ezifanele ukuyi dlala ukuqinisekisa uku ba zonke izinto ezibalule kileyo neziphambili kubo bonke abachaphazelekayo zithathelwa ingqalelo ukuze kulwelwe ukuzalisekisa imibono yabo yeziphumo ezincumisayo zemfundo ezihambelana ngqo nee mfuno zoluntu nophuhliso loqoqosho.
Ii-SGB zimele bonke aba ntu abachaphazelekayo na badlala indima. Aba bantu baquka abazali, ootitshala, abantu abancedisa esiko lweni kunye nabafundi. Ixesha elihlalwa ngamalu ngu e-SGB yiminyaka emi thathu.Amagunya okulawula izikoloUmthetho weziKolo zase Mzantsi Afrika unika ii-SGB amagunya abalulekileyo okulawula izikolo njengenxa lenye yamaziko abalulekileyo olawulo ngentando yoninzi.Ngokuzibandakanya  kwinkqubo yonyulo, abazali baqinisekisa ukuba isikolo sisibenzela futhi sinceda abantwana babo.Nangona kungeyomfuneko ukuba amalungu e-SGB abe neziqinisekiso zemfundo yase-sikolweni, abazali abaneza khono zobuchule bokugcina iincwadi, ezocwangciso-mali kunye nezomthetho ngoku njalo abo banomdla nabano thando olushushu emfu ndweni, bayakhuthazwa uku ba bazigqatse kunyulo.

Aba bathathi-nxaxheba balandelayo banokunyulwa kwi-SGB:
• Abazali babantwana abakweso sikolo.
• Ootitshala abakweso sikolo.
• Abasebenzi kweso sikolo abangengobahlohli.
• Abafundi besikolo samabanga aphezulu.
Yintoni imisebenzi ye-SGB?
• Umgaqo-nkqubo wokwamkelwa kwabafundi esikolweni.
• Ukwenza izigqibo ngomgaqo-nkqubo weelwimi wesikolo.
• Iintlobo zenkolo eziza kulandelwa esikolweni.
• Ukuqulunqa umgaqo-siseko wesikolo nenkcazo yomnqophiso.
• Ukuqulunqa imigaqo yokuziphatha kwabafundi ecacisa neenkqubo zoluleko.
• Uhlahlo lwabiwo-mali nolawulo lwemali.
• Ukucebisa ngokuqeshwa kwabasebenzi.
• Ukuxhasa inqununu, ootitshala nabanye abasebenzi.

title: Umhobe, iflegi, iimbasa, imbasa yesizwe kunye neempawu zibhiyozela iyantlukwano
author: vukuzenzele unnamed
text:
I-Vuk’uzenzele ijonga ukuba luleka kolu suku kwanokuba li thetha ntoni ngathi njengabantu baseMzantsi Afrika.
Ngomhla wama-27 kuTsha zimpunzi kowe-1994 uMzantsi Afrika wabamba unyulo lwalo lokuqala lolawulo lwentando yesininzi olungacaluli ngokobuhlanga. Urhulumente omtsha wanyulwa phantsi kobunko kheli bukaMongameli uNelson Mandela ongasekhoyo. Mninzi umsebenzi owenziweyo kule kule minyaka idlulileyo, ko dwa kusekuninzi okusadinge ka ukuba kwenziwe ukwenzela ukuphucula ilizwe lethu kunye nokuguqula ubomi babo bonke abemi baseMzantsi Afrika.  Le nyanga ayiyiyo nje  eyokubonisa ngomgama osele siwuhambile ukuza kuthi ga ngo njengelizwe, kodwa ikwalixesha lokuba uMzantsi Afrika ubhiyozele amaqhawe kunye namaqhawekazi alo ngeeMbasa zeSizwe. Ezi zezona mbasa ziphezulu kakhulu apho ilizwe, lisebenzisa uMongameli walo, lizinikezela kubemi balo kunye nabemi bamazwe angapha ndle abadumileyo nabahloni tshwayo.UMgaqo-siseko woMzantsi Afrika UMgaqo-siseko waqulu nqwa ngokweSahluko sesi-5 soMgaqo-siseko wexeshana (uMthetho uNombolo 200 wowe-1993) kwaye wamkelwa kuqala yiNdlu yoQulunqo loMgaqo-si seko ngomhla wesi-8 kuCanzibe kowe-1996. Watyikitywa waba ngumthetho ngomhla we-10 kweyoMnga kowe-1996.
Iimpawu zethu zesizweUMzantsi Afrika wohlukile ngenxa yokuba sinokubhiyozela ukwahlukana kwethu ngee Mpawu zeSizwe nangeFlegi yeSi zwe, ngoMhobe woMzantsi Afrika nangembasa yesizwe.
Iflegi yoMzantsi Afrika yohlukile.
Yayilwa nguFred Brownell, owayesakuba kwiSouth African State Herald, kwaye yasetyenzi swa okokuqala ngomhla wama-27 kuTshazimpunzi kowe-1994.
Imibala yeflegi ayinayo intsingiselo ethile ngoko ke ayikho into eyimeleyo evunywa jikelele ekufuneka idityaniswe nemibala yale flegi.
U-‘V’ kwiflegi ubonisa ukuhla ngabezana kwezinto ezahlukeneyo zoMzantsi Afrika kwanokuhamba kunye indlela eya phambili ngo kusingisele kwimanyano.
Ukuxhoma iflegi Xa iflegi ixhonywe eludongeni ngobude, umgca obomvu kufuneka ube ngasekhohlo kulo mntu ujiyongileyo  uze umphetho ongqi ndilili okanye eli cala lingena intambo libe phezulu. Xa imiswe ngokuxwesileyo, umphetho ongqi ndilili okanye eli cala lingena inta mbo kufuneka libe ngasekhohlo kulo uyijongileyo uze umgca obomvu ube ngaphezulu. Xa i xhonywe ecaleni okanye ngase mva kwesithethi entlanganisweni, kufuneka ibekwe ngasekunene kwesithethi. Xa ibekwe kwenye indawo kwindawo yentlanganiso, kufuneka ibe ngasekunene kwabaphulaphuli.
Imbasa yeSizwe  Imbasa yesizwe, ikwaziwa nje ngomqondiso wesizwe, lelona phawu lesizwe libonakalayo ne lihlonitshwayo.
Imbasa yeSizwe iluphawu olu bonakalayo lestampu sesizwe. Uxwebhu olunophawu lwesta mpu sesizwe kuthetha ukuba elo xwebhu lisuka kwabasemagunyeni abaphezulu kwaye aluna kutshintshwa kuba ligunyaziswe laze lavunywa nguMongameli waseMzantsi Afrika.
Imbasa yesizwe yaseMzantsi Afrika yaphehlelelwa ngoSuku lweNkululeko  ngowama-2000. Izinto ezikuyo zilungiselelwe ngendlela ebonisa ukuzinza kunye nondiliseko.  Umngqele okwimbasa yesizwe, “!ke e: /xarra //ke” ubhalwe ngo lwimi lwesiKhoisan, futhi uthetha ukuba abantu abohlukeneyo ba yamanyana.
UMhobe weSizwe  UMhobe weSizwe sethu wohlukile njengoko uculwa ngeelwimi ezine.
UMhobe weSizwe waziswa ngowe-1997. Yinguqulelo emfu tshane yemihobe emibini edi tyanisiweyo (u-‘Nkosi Sikelel’ iA frika’ kunye ne-‘The Call of South Africa’/’Die Stem van Suid-Afrika’); eyayiculwa phakathi kowe-1994 kunye nowe-1997.Iimpawu zesizwe sethu zezi zilande layo: 
•	 Isilwanyana	sesizwe,		ibhadi
•	 Intyatyambo	yesizwe,	isiqwane
•	 Umthi	wesizwe,	umkhoba
•	 Intaka	yesizwe,	indwe
•	 Intlanzi	yesizwe,	i-galjoen

title: Ukulwa imbalela enkulu
author: vukuzenzele unnamed
text:
Imbalela lixesha elide apho imvula ina kancinci ngendlela engaqhelekanga khona, nto leyo ekhokelela ekunqongophaleni kwamanzi.
Ngokutsho kukaGqirha uMathieu Roualt, injingalwa zi yaseYunivesithi yaseKapa kwiSebe lezeNzululwazi ngo Lwandle, izinto eziphambili ezi bangela imbalela lifuthe lenka nyamba u-El Niño nokutshi ntsha kwemozulu.  “Inkanyamba u-El Niño sisehlo esindaliweyo nesimana sibuya qho emva kweminyaka emithathu ukuya kwemihlanu. Unyusa amaqondo obushushu kumalwandle ePasifiki nawe Indiya, nto leyo kwelayo icala enokubangela iimeko zembale la,” utsho.
Ukutshintsha kwemozulu yimo echazwa njengoku tshintsha kwiindlela zenkqubo zemozulu ehlabathini liphela okanye kummandla. Yinto leyo eyaqala phakathi ukuya ekupheleni kwenkulungwane yama20, yaye ibangwa ikakhulu ngamaqondo aphezulu omoya  omdaka olapha esibhakabhakeni nozalwa zizibaso zezinto ezaziphila mandulo zaza zaba ngamatye.
“Kule nkulungwane id luleyo, amazantsi e-Afri ka abe nokubaxeka ko kutshintsha kwemozulu unyaka nonyaka, nto leyo ekhokelele kwi mbalela enkulu noku phazamiseka kwezitya lo nezinto eziphilayo elwandle nasehlabathi ni. Oku kutshintsha kwemozulu kunefuthe kushishino lwezolimo, oovimba bamanzi nezokuloba kuze kugqi bele ngoqoqosho ngokubanzi.
Oku kutshintsha kukwacha phazela nokuhamba kwamanzi emachibini, izityalo nokungena kwezondlo elwandle,” uchaze watsho uGqirha Roualt.
Eli futhe liviwa kakhulu ngokukodwa nguMzantsi Afri ka kuba ilizwe lethu kakade selinomyinge ophantsi kakade wokuna kwemvula ngonyaka oziimililitha ezingama-450, xa kuthelekiswa nomyinge wehla -bathi oziimililitha ezingama-860.  Liyintoni ifuthe lembalela?Ngenyanga yoMdumba, iSebe loLawulo lweNtsebenziswano neMicimbi yeMveli layihlela ngokutsha imbalela layisusa kwimo eyintlekele yephondo yayintlekele yesizwe. “Emva kokuhlola ngokutsha ubungakanani nobukhali be mbalela egqubayo ubuncinane kumaphondo amathathu, ab alawuli bentlekele baphinda bayihlela ngokutsha imbalela njengentlekele yesizwe,”  itshilo intloko yeZiko loLawulo lweNtlekele leSizwe, uGqirha Mmaphaka Tau.  Noxa ifuthe lembalela kwe zoqoqosho kunzima ukulili nganisa, libe likhulu kakhulu kwicandelo lezolimo. ENtsho na Koloni, eliliphondo lesibini elikhulu kweli lizwe  elinegalelo kwisambuku semveliso yesizwe (i-GDP), yimisebenzi engama 21 000 eyeyaphela kwikota ye sithathu kulo nyaka uphelileyo.  Imveliso yengqolowa yehle ngeepesenti ezingama-47 kowa ma-2017 yaye kungakho uku silela okunokuba ngangeelitha ezizigidi ezingama-90 zewayini enokuthunyelwa kumazwe angaphandle nenokuthengiswa apha ekhaya.  Ukunqongophala kwamanzi kuza kuphinda kube nefuthe eli buhlungu kugutyulo, unono phelo lwezempilo nokhenketho.
Yintoni eyenziwayo ukuhlangabezana nale meko?Oomasipala abantlithwe yimba lela babekele abahlali namashi shini izithintelo ezingqongqo zokuseyenziswa kwamanzi.  Izikhululo zokufunxa ityuwa emanzini, iinkqubo zokulungi swa kwemibhobho, ukuphinda kusetyenziswe kwamanzi abese le esetyenzisiwe nokutsala amanzi emhlabeni zonke zichongwe njengezisombululo zale meko, kwaye le misebenzi kungoku nje ikumanqanaba awohlukeneyo okuya ekugqityweni.

title: I-App ebizwa iGauteng on the move
author: vukuzenzele unnamed
text:
I-Gauteng on the Move iza kuphelisa ukungaqiniseki okuhamba nokusebenzisa izithuthi zikawonkewonke, kuba ibonelela abakhweli ngolona lwazi luchanekileyo lwexesha, amaxesha ezothutho namaxa biso eGautrain‚ i-Metrobus‚ A Re Yeng‚ Rea Vaya‚ i-Metrorail‚ iiNkonzo zeBhasi zeGautrain‚ iBhasi yoKhenketho lweSixeko saseRhawutini‚ iiNkonzo ze Bhasi zaseTshwane  neenkonzo zeteksi.
Ethetha ekwaziseni le App (unxibelelwano olulodwa nge selula) kwi-ofisi yomseki wayo eMidrand kutsha nje, uMpha -thiswa wezoThutho kwiphondo laseGauteng (u-MEC) , u-Ismail Vadi, uthe isebe lakhe liyayivuma imfuneko yobuch wepheshe balamaxesha neen kqubo zezothutho ezibhadlileyo njengezibe negalelo kuphuhliso lwenkqubo yezothutho.
“URhulumente wePhondo laseGauteng usebenzise ixesha, amalinge nezixhobo ezifanele kileyo ekuphuhliseni isicwang ciso solu hambo esenza kube lula kubakhweli ukunxibele lana neendidi ezahlukenenyo zezothutho ngaphakathi kweli phondo.
"Sesiwabona amandla  obuchwepheshe bokungeni sa izinto ezintsha eziguqula imo yeenkonzo zezothutho lukawonkewonke. Ayithanda buzeki into yokuba iinguqu zobuchwepheshe ehlabathi ni liphela zivuselele inguqu kwicandelo lezothutho, kwaye kufuneka ezi nguqu sizamkele, siziqhelanise nazo,” utshilo.
UVadi uqinisekise into yokuba eli phondo liza kuthi gqolo lise -benzise ukungena kobuchule obutsha, uphando nophuhliso ukuze kukhuthazwe iphondo elisemgangathweni kuphucul we ukusebenza kakuhle noku fikelela kwiinkonzo zezothutho.
Yakuba ikhutshelwe, le App yenza kube lula kwabo bayise benzisayo ukuba bacwangcise uhambo lwabo ngokukhetha iindlela zezothutho abazi nqwenelayo, amaxesha oku hamba nezinye izinto abazikhe thayo, ezinjengeyona hambo imfutshane nengabizi kakhulu.
 Umfundi waseRhawutini nongumkhweli, uGlen Dlamini, uthe le App iza kwenza ama wakawaka abakhweli azive onelisekile.
“Ngenene yi-App ema ngalisayo le. Lilinge elikhulu lorhulumente kwaye ngoku qinisekileyo liguqula ukwe nzeka kwezinto, ngokukodwa kumntu omtsha ofana nam ohla enyuka esuka eSoweto aye kwiYunivesithi yaseRhawutini e-Auckland Park yonke imihla.
“Noko ngoku ndingazicwa ngcisa ngcono iihambo zam, malunga nezimali zam ndize ndibale namaxesha okuhamba ukuya kufikelela apho ndiya khona.
 “Ndicinga ukuba yi-App emangalisayo, kwaye nje ngomntu ongenguye oweli phondo, iza kundinceda malu nga nokuhambahamba,” utshilo uKhanyo Malunga xa ethetha noVuk’uzenzele e-Blairgowrie.
“Xa ndilapha ndize kudliwano-ndlebe malunga nomsebenzi, ndiza kukwazi ukucwangcisa ngcono, ndize ndingalahleki,” wongeze ngelitshoyo.
Le app ungayifumanela izi xhobo ze-Android ne-iPhone  kwiivenkile ngeevenkile zeApp.

title: Kukho ulwimi olusemthethweni olutsha olu zayo eMzantsi Afrika
author: Neo Semono
text:
UMongameli Cyril Rama phosa ubhengeze oku nge thuba kubanjwe umsitho wokubeka ngokusesikweni iKumkanikazi yesizwe saBa lobedu eMokwakwaila Stadi um eBolobedu, eGa-Modjadji eLimpopo.
IKhelobedu lulwimi olu thethwa sisizwe saBalobedu apho uKumkanikazi we Mvula wesizwe saBalobedu ongekabekwa, eza kuthatha esi sikhundla xa eneminyaka eli-18, emva kokuba ebekwe ngokusesikweni njengoKu mkanikazi Modjadji we-VII.
Uza kufikelela ebuntwini obudala ngokwamasiko nezi -thethe zesizwe saBalobedu.
“Ukubekwa kwale Ku mkanikazi kuyimbali kwaye uMama Winnie Madikize la-Mandela ebeza kuvuyela kakhulu. Esi sisizwe sokuqa la futhi nekukuphela kwaso esiphethwe yiKumkanikazi kweli lizwe nakweli lizwe kazi liphela,” utshilo uMo ngameli Ramaphosa.
UMongameli Ramaphosa uphinde wambophelela urhu lumente kwiphulo lokubu yisela isidima newonga lee nkokeli zomthonyama.
IKumkanikazi yeSizwe sa Balobedu yavunywa ngoku sesikweni ngenyanga yo Kwindla ngowama-2016  emva kokuba iKomishini engeeMbambano namaBa ngo eeNkokeli zoMthonyama (i-CTLDC) iqhube uphando ngendawo esibekwa kuyo isi zwe saBalobedu, ngokwezice lo ezangeniswa kwi-CTLDC.  “Urhulumente uzimisele ukuqinisekisa ukuba ayafeze kiswa amasolotya eSahluko 12 soMgaqo-siseko, ingaku mbi elokubuyiselwa kwesidi ma seenkokeli zomthonyama kweli lizwe lilawulwa ngo kwentando yesininzi pha ntsi koMgaqo-siseko,” utshi lo uMongameli Ramaphosa.
Uthe ukuvunyelwa uku ba abantu basetyhini babe kwe njengeeKumkanikazi eMzantsi Afrika kubonisa ukuzibophelela kumthetho ohlonipha ukubaluleka ko lingwano phakathi kwabase tyhini namadoda, ngeli thuba ihlonitshwayo indima yoku khokela edlalwa ngooma ma kuwo onke amabakala obomi.
“Iinkokeli zomthonyama zinendima ebalulekileyo ekufuneka ziyidlale ekwa kheni isizwe esingahlu tshwa yindlala, esingena ngxaki yentswelo-ngqesho kunye neyokungalingani.
Iinkokeli zethu zomthonyama kufuneka zibe phambili kwi dabi lokulwela ukubuyise lwa kamalungelo kunye nesi dima sabantu bakuthi.”Uphinde wayibethelela i ndima ebalulekileyo edlalwa zinkokeli zomthonyama ekubuyiseleni umhlaba  kubanikazi bawo abafanele kileyo.
“Kufuneka baqinisekise ukuba umhlaba ubuyiselwa ebantwini abawusebenzayo futhi abo babuyiselwe u mhlaba kufuneka babe nazo izixhobo zokuwusebenza,” utshilo uMongameli Rama phosa.
Abantu abaqikelelwa  kwizigidi ezingama-25 aba hlala emaphandleni bapha ntsi kweenkokeli zomtho nyama. 


Ubusazi na?
• Isizwe saBalobedu saphatheka kakubi ngowe-1972 ngethuba iKumkanikazi yeMvula yelo xesha uMakoma Modjadji ehluthelwa ubukhosi namagunya akhe, waze endaweni yoko wenziwa inkosi.
• Iilali neenkosi ezaziphantsi kwakhe zaye zafakwa phantsi kolawulo lwamazwana ayengozimele-geqe iLebowa neGazankulu ngolo hlobo amasiko atyebileyo atshabalala futhi nomnombo wekumkanikazi osele uneminyaka engaphezulu kwengama-400 walahleka.

title: Ulutsha luyalixhasa iphulo le-YES
author: vukuzenzele unnamed
text:
I-YES, ebisanda kuphehle lwe kwezi veki ziphelileyo nguMongameli Cyril Rama phosa, yenzelwe ukuxho bisa ulutsha ngezakhono zomsebenzi nezobugcisa ezifunekayo ukuze ubani akwazi ukuthatha inxaxhe ba kumaphulo okuguqula uqoqosho lweli lube lwale mihla.
UTemane uyacacisa uku ba emva kokuba ethweswe isidanga ngowama-2016 zange akwazi ukufaka izice lo zemisebenzi kuba wa yengenawo amava afu nwayo kwizithuba zemise benzi.
“Kwakunzima kakhulu ukufuna umsebenzi ube u ngenawo amava omsebe nzi. Ngentlahla ndaye ndadi bana neLulaway Recrui tment Agency yona esebe nzisana ne-YES, yandinika isithuba sokuqeqeshelwa umsebenzi ndiphangela.
I-YES lilinge eliqhutywa ngokubambisana ngurhu lumente, imibutho yabase benzi kunye namashishini lokunika abantu abatsha boMzantsi Afrika abasisi gidi izithuba zomsebenzi ohlawulayo kule minyaka mithathu izayo.
Uphando olwenziwe nga mahlakani ethu lubonisa ukuba isithuba esingunyaka omnye ubani esebenza kwiCV ehamba neleta yengcaci so nengqina izakhono zom faki-sicelo, siwaphucula ngokuphindwe kathathu amathuba okufumana u msebenzi.
UMasego wongeze ngelithi uyawuthanda umsebenzi wakhe, kuba ubandakanya ukunceda abantu abatsha ukuba bafumane umsebenzi njengoko yena ekwicandelo lokuqeshwa kwabantu aba qeqeshwa besemsebenzini.
Ngethuba kuphehlelelwa i-YES uMongameli Rama phosa waboniswa abantu abatsha abali-100 abanga bokuqala ukuqeshwa  ngale nkqubo, abasebenza kwa-ABSA, e-Investec, eNe tcare, eSasol nase-Unilever.
“Eli phulo silibona nje ngenye yeenkqubo zesizwe ezingungundoqo nezibanzi eziza kuncedisa ekudaleleni abantu abatsha amathuba.
Enye yeenjongo eziphambi li zeli phulo kukuphuhlisa izakhono nobuchule baba ntu abatsha,” utshilo uMo ngameli Ramaphosa.
Uye wahlaba ikhwelo ku mashishini asakhasayo uku ba nawo adlale eyawo indi ma njengoko wona ekwazi ukuqesha abantu abaninzi futhi waze waphinda wathi amashishini amakhulu  awanakukwazi ukuqesha bonke abantu abatsha ewo dwa.
Ngokokutsho kweGo sa eliPhezulu lesiGqeba (i-CEO) le-YES uTashmia Ismail-Saville, eMzantsi Afrika kubantu abazizigi di ezili-15.5 abaneminyaka yobudala ephakathi kwe li-18 nengama-34, abazizigi di eziyi-5.8 abaphangeli.
“I-YES ineenjongo zokuni ka abantu abatsha beli, abangaxhamliyo kwezi  ndlela zokuqesha zise tyenziswayo ngoku kweli lizwe, ela thuba lokuqala libalulekileyo lokufuma na umsebenzi osemganga thweni nohlawulayo,” u tshilo u-Ismail-Saville.
Njengesibonelelo soku bulela amashishini asa khasayo, lawo aqeshe aba ntu abantsundu abatsha, abaneminyaka yobudala ephakathi kweli-18 nenga ma-29, aza kuba nelungelo lofumana iSaphulela se Rhafu yokuQesha esilinga na nemali eli-1 000 leerandi ngenyanga.
Abantu abatsha abayinxa lenye ye-YES kufuneka ba be:
• Neminyaka yobuda -la ephakathi kweli-18 nengama-34.
• Ngabantu abasebe nexesha elingaphezu lu kweenyanga ezinta ndathu bengasebenzi.
• Ngabantu abantsu ndu (umntu oMnya ma, oweBala okanye oliNdiya).
• Ukuba iinkampani zi funa ukufaka isicelo sokufumana iSaphule lo seRhafu yokuQesha, abo bantu abatsha ku funeka babe neminya ka yobudala ephakathi kweli-18 nengama-29.
Ingaba baza kwamkela malini?Umvuzo kulindeleke ukuba ulingane nomvuzo wesizwe ongowona mncinci onga ma-3 500 eerandi ngenyanga, oquka noqeqesho namanye amaqithi-qithi. Umyinge wee ndleko yimali engama-55 000 eerandi ngonyaka.

title: Uxanduva loMzantsi Afrika lokufundisa ulutsha
author: More Matshediso
text:
UMphathiswa uPandor uthe luxanduva lwelizwe ukuxhasa abantu abangamahlwempu kunye nabo bangathathi  ntweni.
Ebethetha ngethuba lendi bano noonondaba apho athe wathi thaca indlela eza kuqa -liswa ngayo inkqubo yemfu ndo ephakamileyo yasimahla eMzantsi Afrika.
UMphathiswa uPandor ubhe ngeze ukuba uRhulumente ugalele enye imali ezibhiliyoni eziyi-7.166 zeerandi ukuze iye kwiibhasari zabantwana aba phuma kumakhaya ahlupheki leyo namkela imivuzo ephantsi abafunda kwiiyunivesithi nakwiikholeji zoQeqesho lobuGcisa kunye neMfundo yezoQeqesho (i-TVET) kulo nyaka.
UMphathiswa uPandor uqinisekisile ukuba imali ezi bhiliyoni eziyi-4.581 zeerandi ibekelwe bucala ukulungise lela abafundi abayifaneleyo abafunda eyunivesithi yaze imali ezibhiliyoni eziyi-2.585 zeerandi yabekelwa abafundi abafunda kwiikholeji ze-TVET.
Ngowama-2017 urhulumente wamemezela ukuba imfu ndo ephakamileyo iza kuba simahla kubafundi abahlu phekileyo kunye nabo bavela kumakhaya amkela umvuzo wonyaka ohlangeneyo oya kutsho kuma-350 000 eerandi.
Abafundi baxhaswa ngenkqubo yebhasari eyandisi weyo, ethatha indawo yema li-mboleko yangaphambili kunye nenkqubo enesixa esiyi bhasari ebinikezelwa siSikimu seSizwe soNcedo lwezeMali sabaFundi (i-NSFAS).  “Ulwabiwo olusisiseko oluya kwi-NSFAS lokuxhasa abafu ndi abahluphekayo nabo ba phuma kumakhaya amkela imi vuzo ephantsi abafunda kwii yunivesithi kunye ne-TVET luza kwanda ukusuka kwimali ezibhiliyoni eziyi-9.849 zee randi ngowama-2017/18 ukuya kwiibhiliyoni ezinga ma-35.321 zeerandi ngowa ma-2020/21.
“Oku kuthetha ukuba kufune ka ziphucuke iinkqubo ze-NS FAS kunye nendlela asebenza ngayo. Ngoko ke siye sabekela bucala enye ima-li ezizigidi ezili-105 zeerandi kwe si sithuba seNkqubo-sikho kelo yeNkcitho yesiGaba  esiPhakathi ukunceda i-NSFAS ukuba yandise kwaye iqinise amandla ayo okulawula,"  utshilo uMphathiswa.
Abafundi abafanelekileyo, nokuba benza owuphi unyaka,  abafunda kwiikholeji ze-TVET zikarhulumente baza kufuma na ibhasari eyanele imali yabo yokufunda kunye nezinto zokufunda.
Ukunyuswa kwemali ngowa ma-2018/19 kuza kuqinisekisa ukuba abafundi abangama-458 875 baza kufumana iibhasari.Abafundi abamalunga nama50 480 abafunda kwiikholeji zeTVET, abafanelekileyo ukuba bafumane imali yokubancedisa ngezinto zokukhwela, indawo yokuhlala kunye nokutya, baza kuxhaswa nabo; ngelixa abanye abangama-82 600 beza kufumana izibonelelo zothutho.
UMphathiswa uthe esi sixa sitsha semali kulindeleke ukuba sixhase inani leendawo zokufunda ezimalunga nama83 200 kwezi zingama-208 000 (ama-40%) zikhoyo zabafu ndi abatsha kwiiyunivesithi ngowama-2018.

title: ISebe leMicimbi yezeKhaya lizimisele ukulwa imigca emide
author: More Matshediso
text:
Ngokutsho koMphathiswa weMicimbi yezeKhaya uMalusi Gigaba imigca emide ibibange lwa bubuninzi obugquthisileyo babantu, indawo enganelanga yabantu abanceda uluntu, imiba yobunkokeli kunye nokuvalwa kwee-ofisi ngeMigqibelo.
Ukulungisa le ngxaki, isebe libala inani lee-ofisi zalo kulo lonke eli lize lijonge ukuba zeziphi na ezifuna ukuba iphu culwe indlela ezisebenza ngayo.
“Siza kuqhuba uvavanyo lokuphanda ngokwaneliseka kwabantu, senze iziko loqhaga mshelwano nemibuzo lisebenze ngokunemagingxi-gingxi, sifu mane isisombululo kwiingxaki yabantu abasuka beze kwii-ofi si zethu bengenzanga dinga kunye nobukhulu bamaziko ethu anceda uluntu, siqwalasele ukuba asinakuqalisa ngenkqubo yamaxesha ahluka-hlukeneyo okuphangela, silungise nobu xhaka-xhaka bethu obu ngazinzanga, sandise izihlandlo ezingabhengezwanga abaphathi abaphezulu abatyelela ngazo kwii-ofisi zethu, siphucule ukuhamba komsebenzi kwaye siqinise ukuqhagamshelana na bantu," uMphathiswa uqinise kisile.
Ezi zicwangciso ziza kuqalisa ukusebenza njengamanyathelo okungenelela exesha elifutshane, eliphakathi kunye nexesha elide.
UMphathiswa uchazile ukuba le miceli-mngeni ayizuku sonjululwa ngamanyathelo okungenelela akhawulezileyo kwaye ucele uluntu ukuba lube nomonde ngelixa isebe liqalisa ngala manyathelo.
“Sizimisele ukwenza konke okusemandleni ethu ukuze si wuphumelele ngandlela zonke lo mlo wemigca emide, nangona kukho imiqobo neminye imice li-mngeni kweli sebe,” uMpha thiswa uGigaba utshilo.
Ngaphambi kwesibhengezo sezicwangciso zenkqubo isebe lenze ingxelo yokuhlola uku fumanisa indlela efanelekileyo yokulawula kakuhle imigca kunye nokuphucula iinkonzo zayo.
Le ngxelo ikhankanye iinkqubo ezingazinzanga, inkqubo yoku ngahambi kakuhle komsebenzikunye nezicwangciso zokuqha  gamshelana ezingahambelaniyo, into leyo ibangela ukuba abantu bangoneliseki nemigca emide.
Ngokutsho koMphathiswa, ezi zinto zilandelayo zenza ibe mbi nangakumbi le ngxaki: 
■ Ulawulo olukumgangatho ophantsi kwezinye ii-ofisi 
■ Ukungasetyenziswa  kwabasebenzi ngokweza khono zabo  
■ Ukungabikho kwenkqubo yokwenza idinga phambi kokuba umntu eze kwii-ofisi zesebe 
■ Ulawulo lwemigca olunge nampumelelo  
■ Ukusebenzisa inkqubo esebe nza ngezandla kunye nezi zisebenzela ngokwazo ngaxeshanye • Ukunqongophala kwee-ofisi zesebe ingakumbi kwiindawo ezinabantu abaninzi • Ingcaciso engeyonyaniso ngokuyekiswa kwencwa di-zazisi eluhlaza  • Izalathisi ezingacacisi kaku hle kwii-ofisi zesebeKukho ii-ofisi zeMicimbi yeze Khaya ezili-184 ezikwaziyo ukuthatha iifoto kunye nezinga ma-411 ezikwaziyo ukunikezela ezinye iinkonzo.
Zezi ofisi zili-184 kuphe la ezikwaziyo ukukhupha nokuqwalasela izicelo zeKha di-sazisi kunye neepasipothi.
Isebe lihlaziya ii-ofisi ezi ngoomahamba-nandlwana ezingama-78 kwaye liqinise kile ukuba ziza kuthunye lwa kuwo wonke uMzantsi  Afrika ngesiqingatha sesibini ngowama-2018.

UBUSAZI NA?
Ukususela oko kwakhutshwa amaKhadisazisi ngowama-2013, ii-ofisi zeMicimbi yezeKhaya sezikhuphe amakhadi angaphezulu kwezigidi ezilithoba.

title: Ukuthakazelele kakhulu ukudalwa kwemisebenzi
author: Adele Schormann
text:
Ngenkxaso yemali evela kwiSebe lezeNdalo, le nkqubo ingena phantsi kweNkqubo yeMisebenzi yoLuntu eNatyisi weyo (i-EPWP).Inika ithemba kuninzi lolutsha olungafumani imisebenzi kwaye idlale indima enkulu ekuthinteleni nasekulawuleni imililo yamadlelo, nokunciphisa umo nakalo owenziwa yile mililo.
Le nkqubo iqeshe abantu abangaphezulu kwabangama5 000 abasuka kwiindawo ezi hlelelekileyo kwaye ibaqeqeshe kwizakhono zokwazi ngemi lilo, ezemfundo, ukuthintela nokubamba umlilo unganwenwi kunye nezinye izakhono, ezifana  noncedo lokuqala, ukuchwela, ukupheka, ezempilo nokhuseleko kunye nonxibelelwano.
Igosa lonxibelelwano le-WOF uLeboang Maseko ucacisa uku ba le nkqubo igxile kulutsha ize iqeshe nabantu abakhubazeki leyo ukuba basebenze kumaziko abo amaphondo.
“Sigxininisa kakhulu kuphuhliso lwezakhono size sibonelele ulutsha olusanda kuphuma kwizikolo zamabanga aphe zulu ngemisebenzi okanye olusanda kuthweswa izidanga kumaziko emfundo ephakami leyo. Kwabo baqeshwe kwiWOF, abangama-94% lulutsha, abangama-31% ngabantu ba setyhini ize i-3% ibe ngabantu abakhubazekileyo,” ungqine watsho.
ULorraine Mokoena (one minyaka yobudala engama-31) waseMpumalanga ngomnye wabo baxhamlileyo kule nkqubo.
Yiminyaka eli-11 esebenza kwiWOF.
Emva kokuphumelela kwakhe imatriki usokolile ukufumana umsebenzi isithuba seminyaka emibini. Udade wabo wamxelela ngale nkqubo ye-WOF.
“Inkqubo yokubhalisa ibenzi ma. Ukuphila qete yeyona nto ibalulekileyo kwizinto ezifunwayo phambi kokuba uthathwe kulo msebenzi kwaye ab a qalayo bavocwavocwa imizimba, beqeqeshwa. Xa uphume lele ukumelana nemithambo enzima yokuvocavocwa kufu neka uphu melele novavanyo lukagqirha uze emva koko uqalise uqeqesho lokuba ngumcimi-mlilo,” utshilo.
UMokoena uqale njengomci mi-mlilo osaqalayo waza wase benza wenyuka wade wafikelela kwisikhundla sokuba ngumci mi-mlilo ophezulu weenkokheli zeqela labasebenzi, ekhokela iqela labacimi-mlilo abali-18.
“Lo msebenzi ubuguqulile ubomi bam. Ndim kuphela osebenzayo kubantwana base khaya nabantwana bam ababini.
Ngoku ndiyakwazi ukondla usapho lwam ndize ndithumele nabantwana bam eskolweni,” utshilo uMokoena.
Uvumile ukuba icandelo locimo-mlilo ngokwesiqhelo lilicandelo elinabantu abangamadoda abaninzi kwaye ufunde ukuba omelele yena njengoko engumntu wasetyhini kulo msebenzi.
UMokoena uzimisele ekubeni ngumlawuli womsebenzi kule minyaka mibini izayo.
Oku kuza kumenza ibe nguye ojongene nawo onke amaqela e-WOF aseMpumalanga.
Njengoko sijongene nexesha lemililo yamadlelo, uMokoena unikezela ngezi ngcebiso zi landelayo ukuthintela imililo yamadlelo:
• Musa ukuntumeka imililo kwindawo evulekileyo xa ungazokwazi ukuyilawula.
• Qinisekisa ukuba unalo lonke uncedo ngezixhobo zokumelana nayo nantoni na enokwenzeka.
• Musa ukushiya umlilo unga hoywanga.
• Jonga kakuhle isimo sezulu.
• Makungantunyekwa mililo kwindawo evulekileyo xa kushushu kakhulu okanye ngeemini ezinomoya.

title: Oonogada bemiyezo yendalo bakhusela  imikhombe
author: Dale Hes
text:
UNyawo, noyinxalenye ye projekthi yabahloli bezendalo eqhutywa yi-EPWP , ukholelwa ekubeni kubalulekile ukufundiswa koluntu malu-nga nokulondoloza indalo.
“Kufanele siphume siye eluntwini ukuze silwazise ukuba kutheni kubalulekile ukuba siyilondoloze indalo.
Kulapho kuphela uluntu luyakuyazi indima nokubalule ka kwezilwanyana zasendle,” utshilo.
Le nkqubo, ixhobisa abemi baseMzantsi Afrika abase batsha ngezakhono aba zidingayo ukuze bakwazi ukusebenza kulondolozo lwendalo nenzululwazi engezilwanyana nezityalo, iqinisekisile ukuba uNyawo uyakwazi ukukhathalela usapho lwakhe.
 “Ikhaya lam linophahla olo meleleyo ngoku, olungavuziyo. Konke oku kwenzeke ngenxa yomsebenzi wam.
Ndichwayitile kukuba ndafu mana eli thuba,” utshilo.
UMphathiswa wezeNdalo uGq Edna Molewa aba bahloli ubabiza ngokuba ‘ngoo nogada abakhusela imiyezo yendalo kuba badlala indima ebaluleke kakhulu ekulweni ulwaphulo-mthetho lwezendalo, olufana nokuzingelwa kubulawe imikhombe ngokungekho mthethweni.
 “Kulo nyaka uphelileyo kutyalwe abahloli bezendalo abali-1 659 kwiindawo apho ukuzingelwa kubalawe imikhombe ngokungekho mthethweni kugquba khona ukuba bayokuncedisa ngokukhusela indalo. Bazakuxhotyiswa ukuba babe ngabakhuseli bemikhombe kwezi ndawo,” utshilo. UNyawo ube yinxalenye yeqela elabamba umzingeli ongekho mthethweni e–Umkhuze Game Reserve, nokukhokelele ekufunyanisweni kwakhe enetyala. “Ndaziva ndizingca ngamalinge wam kwaye kweli tyala, ulwazi olunzulu ngokhuselo lwezilwanyana zasendle lwandinceda  njengokuba lwakhokelela ekubanjweni kwalo mzingeli ungekho mthethweni,” utshi lo.
Le nkqubo incede kakhulu ekuncediseni ngokubanjwa, ukuphandwa nokugwetywa kwabazingeli abangekho mthethweni; ukuncitshiswa kokuzingelwa okungekho mthethweni kwezilwanyana zasendle kutsho  kwehla ngama-50%; nokuncitshiswa ngama-76% kwezenzo zoku thiyela izilwanyana ngezigu nemigibe.

title: Umfama obhinqileyo ulime wada wanempumelelo
author: Nonkululeko Mathebula
text:
UMahlatse waqala ukuvo lontiya kwifama yepepile eluhlaza ekufutshane nekhaya lakhe ngeempela-veki nangee holide zesikolo eminyaka ili15 ukuncedisa umama wakhe owayengaphangeli ukugxotha ikati eziko.
UMatlakane uzinze  eGa-Moisimane eBuchum nje ngaphandle kwePolokwane eLimpopo. Uthi nangona ezonwabele nje iziphumo zokusebenza kwakhe nzima kodwa bekungekho lula nga lo lonke ixesha. “Ukukhula bekunzima kum nabantwana basekhaya. Iintanga zam zazidla ngokundihleka uku qala kwam ukusebenza efama zide zithi ubulimi ngumsebenzi wabantu abangafundanga.
“Kwakundivisa kabuhlungu oko kodwa ndandifuna uku fumana ulwazi ukuze nam ndibe ngumlimi,” utshilo.  Uthe akufumana amava athile uMatlakane waya kuJohan Nel, umnini wefama awayevolontiya kuyo wathe tha naye malunga nokutyala eyakhe imbewu yokukhulisa iipepile.
UNel wamnika umhlaba ozihektare ezimbini kwifama yakhe.
“Ndamangaliswa yindlela imbewu nje encinane ekwazi ukujika ngayo ibe zizityalo ezivelisa iipepile eziluhlaza ezinkulu. Ukubona indlela ezikhathalelwa ngayo izityalo ngokusebenzisa izichumiso ukuthintela izinambuzane kwandenza ndakuthanda nangakumbi ukuba ngumlimi.
Ndaziqonda kwangoko ukuba nantsi into endinqwenela uku yenza,” utshilo uMatlakane.
Emva kokuphumelela kwakhe imatriki uMatlakane ukhe waphumla unyaka wamnye nangona wayesele amkelwe kwiiDyunivesithi yaseRhawu tini (i-UJ) ukuba ayokwenza izifundo zobugqwetha.
Wabuyela kuNel ukuya kucela olunye uncedo lobu limi waza wamcebisa ukuba athethe nenkosi yalapho malunga nokuba imnike umhlaba.
Emva kokuba inkosi ibone inkqubela yakhe kwifama kaNel yamnika umhlaba ozi hektare ezingama-40 kwifama iBabirwa Ba Tau Ya Tswala apho aliqhuba khona ngoku ishishini lakhe. Uqeshe abantu abane abatsha ukuba basebenze naye.
UMatlakane uthengisa ii pepile eziluhlaza kwiimarike zeziqhamo nemifuno eBu chum, ePolokwane naseRhawutini.
Nangona ifama yakhe ine-ngeniso engama-50 000 eerandi ngenyanga, uMatlakane usazimisele ukukhula, arhwebe namazwe ehlabathi.
Nangona engafumananga ncedo kurhulumente, uMatlakane uqinisekile ukuba ishishini lakhe liza kuqhuba kakuhle kwaye uthi ezona njongo zakhe ziphambili kukunceda abantu bale ngingqi  abathwaxwa yindlala ngokubaxhobisa ngezakhono ebanika nemisebenzi, njengokuba ishishini lakhe liqhu beka ukukhula .

title: Ukuguqula imfundo ephakamileyo
author: Amukelani Chauke
text:
Njengoko eli lizwe libhi yozela iNyanga yoLutsha, i-Vuk’uzenzele  iqwalasela indlela  ulutsha lwelizwe olubonele lwa ngayo ngamathuba oku phumelela liSebe leMfundo ePhakamileyo noQeqesho.
Unyulwe ngenyanga  yoMdumba njengoMphathi swa weMfundo ePhakami leyo noQeqesho, uNaledi Pandor waza wanikwa u msebenzi wokuqalisa nge nkqubo yemfundo enga hlawulelwayo ukulungisele la abafundi abahluphekileyo nabo kuthiwa “bayalenga lenga”.
Emva koqhankqalazo lu kazwelonke oluthathe ixe sha elide phantsi komxholo othi: #FeesMustFall , kwa ziswe okokuba ngenyanga yoMnga ulutsha oluvela ku makhaya afumana imivuzo engaphantsi kwama-350 000 eerandi ngonyaka luza kufu mana imfundo ephakamileyo noqeqesho engahlawule lwayo. Sele izalisekiswa le nto, kwaye kuza kutha tha iminyaka emihlanu ukungeniswa kwayo.
Inkxaso-mali yebhasariUMphathiswa  Pandor uqiniseki sile okokuba uku -qaliswa kwenkqubo yebhasari kuhamba kakuhle.  “Le nkqubo yebhasari intsha ilinyathelo lokungenelela eliba luleke kakhulu likarhulumente woMzantsi Afrika nelabantu boMzantsi Afrika kuba ziirha fu zabo ezi zihlawula le mali,” utshilo.
Le nkqubo yebhasari inikwa abafundi abalungeleyo abaqala ukungena eyunivesithi kwana bafundi beekholeji zemfundo noqeqesho kwezobugcisa  (i-TVET), ngayo yonke iminya ka yokufunda.  Kule bhasari urhulumente wongeze imali ezibhiliyoni zeerandi eziyi-7.166 ngowa ma-2018 – kuyo ezibhiliyoni eziyi-4.581 yeyabafundi base yunivesithi abafanelekileyo ize yona ezibhiliyoni eziyi-2.585 ibe yeyabafundi beekholeji zeTVET.
UMphathiswa Pandor uthe iikholeji ezizincutshe kwizifu ndo ezizodwa zingangamaziko abalaseleyo afana ngqo nazala ezona zona zakhono kwisigaba esithile semfundo.  Umzekelo, enye ikholeji inga gxila kuphela kubunjineli bokulungisa oomatshini nezi thuthi ize enye igxile kubuchule bokuhamba ngenqwelo-moya nezokuphapaha, uchaze ngeli tshoyo. “Ndikholelwa ekubeni ikamva leekholeji lisekubeni zibe ziincutshe kwizifundo ezithile,” wongeze watsho.
“Sifuna kungafanwa. Asifuni okokuba zonke iikholeji zethu zenze into enye.” Kusenjalo inkqubo yoPhuhli so lwezaKhono zezoShishino kwiMfundo ePhakamileyo, i-Entrepreneurship Development in Higher Education , iphehlele lwe kulo nyaka uphelileyo uku ze ikhuthaze abantu abatsha ukuba baqale amashishini abo.  Le nkqubo injongo yayo kukulungelelanisa uphuhliso lwezakhono zezoshishino kubafundi abafunda kwii yunivesithi zoMzantsi Afrika.
Oku kuquka izifundo zezakhono zezoshishino kuluhlu lwezifundo zaseyunivesithi, uphuhliso lezakhono zezo shishino zabafundi kunye neeyunivesithi ezizincutshe kwizakhono zezoshishino.
UMphathiswa Pandor uthe kuninzi ekusafuneka kwe nziwe kungekuko kuphela ukunceda abafundi ukuba bawulungele umsebenzi, kodwa babe kwangabadali bemisebenzi ehlawula ngoku fanekileyo.
Angathanda ukubona ama ziko emfundo ephakamileyo efundisa izakhono zezo shishino kuzo zonke izifundo zawo, nto leyo engenza abantu abatsha abanemfundo eno msila  baqala amashishini wabo aza kuqaqambisa leli lizwe.

title: Umqhubi kadokolwane ushukumisa umzi
author: Allison Cooper
text:
UMdletshe wazalelwa  wakhulela ePort Shepstone, wafunda eSt Faiths.
“Akukho nto sasinga dibani nayo ngethuba si sakhula ePort Shepstone.
Kwakungekho loyiko, nje ngoko kunjalo kule mihla, kwaye ilali yonke yayifaka isandla kumba wokukhuli swa kwabantwana.”UMdletshe uphumelele imatrikhi yakhe ngowa ma-2006, phambi kokuba a singise kwiDurban Universi ty of Technology ukuya ku fundela iDiploma kwiMar itime Studies  ngowama-2007.
Akugqiba iSI yakhe  ngowama-2007 neS2 ya khe ngowama-2008 waqa lisa uqeqesho lwakhe elwa ndle oluthatha iminyaka emithathu phantsi kwenka mpani yakwaSafmarine Shipping Company. Apha wafunda ukuqhuba inqa nawa ethwala impahla phakathi elwandle, kwaye emisa kumazibuko ngamazi buko e-Europe, e-Afrika nase-Asia ukuze ajongane nemisebenzi yemithwalo yempahla nokufunda nge zokhuseleko.
Isifundo sakhe sokuqa la sesidanga usiphumelele eneminyaka engama-25, kwangelo xesha linye egqi bezela izifundo zesidanga se-Master’s  kwiPort Ope rations . Esi sesibini isidanga siqinisekise okokuba uku lungele ukuba ngumqhu bi kadokolwane osemthe thweni. “Le nto yayingowo na mngeni mkhulu kuba ukuba ngumqhubi kadoko lwane akufuni mntu unamfu ndo yasidanga. Kufuneka i-S1, i-S2 nokuqeqeshwa e lwandle kuphela. Kusemva koku kuphela apho abantu badla ngokubhalisela uku ba ngabaqhubi bakadoko lwane. Ndizenze zombini ezi zinto ngexesha elinye. Uku phuma kwam emsebenzini, ndandiye ndiye esikolweni ndileqe umsebenzi wesikolo waloo mini,” utshilo.
UMdletshe uyakuthanda ukuba semanzini. “Amanzi angakuxelela izinto ezini nzi ngento eza kwenzeka ebudeni bemini. Ngezinye iimini kuyazola, ngezinye u lwandle luyalwa. Kanti nge zinye iimini ulwandle luba namaza amakhulu. Ngoko ke ulwandle awunakuli gqiba. Kwakhona iinqana wa azimilanga ngokufanayo kwaye zithwala imithwalo eyahlukeneyo, nto leyo ethe tha ukuba ziqhutywa ngee ndlela ezahlukeneyo,” u tshilo uMdletshe, umntu oyi vuyelayo into yokusebenza nabasebenzi beenqanawa abazintlanga ezahlukeneyo futhi bephuma kumazwe ngamazwe.
Umsebenzi onemingeniUkuba ngumntu obhinqileyo kwicandelo laselwandle kunemingeni futhi akululanga kwaphela utshilo uMdletshe, obalula imiba engqiyame ngesini njengomnye weyona mingeni mikhulu ngolona hlo bo kuba umsebenzi onjengalo usathathwa njengomsebenzi wamadoda.
“Nanjengoko abantu aba bhinqileyo bezama ukungena kulo msebenzi kwaye bese benza nzima ukubonisa ukuba abantu bayaphazama kwezi ngcinga, umsebenzi lo wona unayo indawo yokubanzima.
Le nto ndiyoyise ngokuphola, ukucinga ngendlela eyakhayo nokusebenza nabantu nge ndlela eyenza ukuba bandi hloniphe. Ngokuthi gqolo uzama kwaye ukhuthele, le miqobo ungayoyisa,” utshilo.
Impumelelo kaMdletshe yokoyisa le miqobo ingqi nwa yimbasa awayifumanayo njengebambela lomphathi wezobugcisa kwezolwa ndle. “Ndafumana le mba sa ngokuba ngoyena mntu ubalaseleyo kumsebenzi wam ngexeshana elifu tshane kuba iziphumo zophi cotho-zincwadi zomsebenzi wam zabuya zingenachaphaza iveki yokuqala ingaphelanga ndilibambela esikhundleni.” Waphinda wafumana imba sa “yokuba ligorhakazi” kweyeDwarha ngowama-2017 ngenxa yokusindisa iinqanawa kwesona siphango sakha sabo nwa nesakha sasibi eDurban.
“Ukuba ngumqhubi kadoko lwane kuthetha ukuba kufu neka ube ngathi uyintombi endala kwaye ube nesibindi,” utshilo.
Ukuphumelela kwakhe isi fundo sesidanga seMaster’s  kwenza umahluko omkhulu.
“Ukuphumelela kwam imfu ndo yesidanga kwaqinise kisa okokuba ndihlonitshwa ngakumbi ngoogxa bam abangamadoda. Yonke imi hla bandibuza okokuba ndi xakeke yintoni kuba sibabini kuphela abahambe lo mgama kwaye ndaba ngowokuqala ukuphumelela iMaritime Di ploma  kwiZibuko laseDurban.
Le nto iyodwa nje indenza ndibalasele,” utshilo, echaza nokuba izifundo zolwandle azilulanga.  Umsebenzi womqhubi kadokolwaneUMdletshe uchaza athi u mqhubi kadokolwane nguye olawula noqhuba udokolwane nabantu abakhweleyo.
Kufuneka aqinisekise uku ba ukhuseleko lukho kwaye izixhobo zokucima umlilo zikwimeko entle, ziqiniseki siwe. Kufuneka avavanye ukhuseleko emsebenzini, enze uvavanyo lonyaka lomsebenzi, aqinisekise ukuba abasebenzi benqanawa bafumana uku qeqeshwa ngendlela eyiyo kwaye bayazityikitya iincwadi zabo zoqeqesho. Kwakhona kufuneka ahlaziye ulawulo lwendlela yokusebenza, kwaye ancedise abasebenzi bakhe baqulunqe inkqubo yokuziphuhlisa ehambelana nomsebenzi wabo. Omnye umsebenzi wakhe kukuqinise kisa ukuba imigaqo-nkqubo yenkampani iyathotyelwa, ukulawula impahla egcini weyo nokwenza i-odolo yezi xhobo zokusebenza.
Ngokwesiqhelo usuku lukaMdletshe lomsebenzi luqala ngokwenza uluhlu lweenqanawa ezifikayo nezihambayo, nto leyo ekufuneka yonke igqitywe phambi kokuphela kwexesha lomsebenzi. “Siqala ngomse benzi weenqanawa ngo-06h00 kusasa sitshayise ngentsimbi ye-17h50 emalanga. Ngokwe siqhelo, oodokolwane ababini basebenza kunye, kwaye emnye kubo ugqiba imise benzi engasibhozo. Emva koko kufuneka siwugqibe wonke umsebenzi ofuna ukubhalwa phantsi. Ngamaxesha kaxa keka umsebenzi siwugqiba kuphela emva kwentsimbi ye-21h00 ebusuku,” utshilo.

title: Ukudalela ulutsha lwase-KZN imisebenzi
author: Hlengiwe Ngobese
text:
Abantu abatsha abangama-25 baKwaZulu-Natal bafumene uqeqesho kunye nomsebenzi ngokuvulwa kwalo mzi-mveliso mtsha wakwaMahindra eDurban.
Abasebenzi bafumana uqeqesho oluqhutywa  yinkampani yakwaMahi ndra Group isebenzisana no-AIH Logistics futhi baza kuthunyelwa e-India ukuze bafumane olunye uqeqesho xa kukho imfuneko.
Umsebenzi wokuvelisa iimoto kodwa osalingwayo sele uqalile kulo mzi-mve liso kwaye kucetywe uku velisa iimoto ezingama 2 000 ngonyaka, inani elo liza kunyuka ngokuha mba kwexesha libe zimoto ezingama-4 000 ngonyaka.
"Olu tyalo-mali luza kwenza amanye amashishini aluthembe uqoqosho lweli lizwe. Oku kubonisa ukuba iKwaZulu-Natal liphondo elityebileyo ngamathuba otyalo-mali. Lo mzi-mve-liso ukwangumzekelo  wamalinge enziwa yiDurban okuthoba amaxhala kwabo bamathidala ukuza kutyala imali kwesi sixeko,” utshilo uMphathiswa wePhondo wezoPhuhliso loQoqosho, ezoKhenketho kunye nezeNdalo, uSihle Zikalala ngethuba kuvu lwa lo mzi-mveliso ngoku sesikweni.Uthi imisebenzi yokuqala edalwe ngulo mzi-mveliso iza kwandisa inani labantu abanezakhono kweli pho-ndo.
Omnye wabasebenzi balo mzi-mveliso nguSthembiso Mthembu onesidanga sobunjineli, uthi uvuya kakhulu ngalo msebenzi.
"Ndihleli ekhaya unyaka wonke ndingafumani msebenzi. Lo msebenzi  undincedile kuba ngoku ndiyakwazi ukuzondla mna nekhaya lam. Nango na ndinesidanga sobunji neli kwezokukhanda  iinjini noomatshini aku-kho nto ingako bendiyazi ngokwenziwa kweemoto.
Olu qeqesho silufumeneyo lusincedile satsho sazithe-mba nathi ngomsebenzi wethu," utshilo.
IsiKhulu seMisebenzi yeHlabathi sakwaMahindra u-Arvind Matthew uthi le nkampani ineenjongo zokuthenga ama-40%  eentsimbi ze-Pik Up apha eMzantsi Afrika.
"Ukwenziwa kwe-Pik  Up kweli linyathelo  lokuqala kwizicwangciso zethu zexesha elide, zona eziquka ukwandisa izithuba zemisebenzi kwiphondo kunye namathuba okuthengwa kweentsimbi ne-zinye izixhobo zokwenza iimoto KwaZulu-Natal.

title: Oosomashishini bezamachiza baseFreyistatha badala imisebenzi
author: More Matshediso
text:
IKevali Chemicals yinkampani yokuqala yaseFreyistatha eye yabantu abamnyama eyenza iikhemkhali. Le nkampani yenza iintlobo ezahlukeneyo zeekhemikhali zokuhluza ukungcola emanzini, ezokucoca endlwini kunye nakwizindlu zangasese futhi yenza neglu yokuncamathisela.
Le nkampani yasekwa ngowa ma-2014 ngabahlobo abahlanu abazingcali zeekhemikhali, kwiimpahla ezithengiseka ngokukhawuleza, kumsebenzi wokuqaliswa nokudidiyelwa kweemveliso ezintsha kunye nakwiintlobo ezahlukeneyo zeglu yokuncamathisela.
UMlawuli wesiGqeba wakwa Kevali Chemicals uFuneka Khu malo uthi i-BIS yayinceda inka-mpani yabo yatsho yakwazi ukuthenga oomatshini kunye nezinye izixhobo zokuqalisa ukuvelisa iimveliso zokuhluza ukungcola emanzini, ezokucoca endlwini nezokubulala iintsholongwane kunye neglu yokuncamathisela.
 "Ekuqaleni kwanyanzeleka ukuba sifake imali kweli shishini ukuze likwazi ukuqalisa ukusebenza kodwa ethubeni saye safumana inkxaso-mali kwiSebe lezoRhwebo noShishino (i-dti) ekhutshwa yi-BIS kunye neQumrhu loPhuhliso lwamaShishini (i-PIC)," ucacise watsho uKhumalo.
I-BIS yinkqubo yezibone lelo-mali yoMgaqo-nkqubo wooSomashishini Abamnyama eyenzelwe ukuvulela amathuba oosomashishini abamnyama baseMzantsi Afrika ngokuthi banikwe uncedo olungayimali okanye lube zezinye izinto ezinge yomali olulungiselelwe kanye bona kunye neemeko zabo.
UKhumalo uthi batyala imali ezizigidi ezili-18 zeerandi ukunceda inkampani ukuze ikwazi ukuqalisa ukusebenza kwaye kwathatha iinyanga ezili-11 ukuze inkampani iqalise ukwenza inzuzo.
Imveliso zayo le nkampani zithe ngiswa kulo lonke eli loMza ntsi Afrika futhi ziyafumaneka nase-Uganda, Namibia kunye naseTanzania.
UKhumalo uthi indima edla lwa yile nkampani ekuhlaleni ingaphezulu nakule misebenzi iyidalayo.
"Ngaphezu kokudalela abantu balapha imisebenzi, sinazo nee-nkqubo zokuncedisa kwiingxaki zokuhlala apho sinceda oomama basezilokishini nasemaphandleni ukuba bavule awabo amashishini amancinci enza izinto zokucoca ezindlini nakwizindlu zanga sese," utshilo.
Uthi oosomashishini abaseba tsha kufuneka bazi ukuba ukuqa la ishishini akululanga kodwa ku funeka bangalahli ithemba kuba baza kuvuzwa ekugqibeleni.
USekela-Mphathiswa we-dti uBulelani Magwanishe uthi le nkampani yakwaKevali Chemicals ifanele kukuhlonitshwa kuba yinkampani yokuqala kwicandelo lezeekhemikhali, amachiza neeplastiki ukuba ifumane inkxaso-mali kule Nkqubo yooSomashishini Abamnyama ukususela yasekwayo.
"Le nkampani iza kudala imisebenzi efunwa ngabomvu eza kufunyanwa ngabantu beendawo ezingqonge iHarrismith aba thwaxwa yintswela-ngqesho," uSekela-Mphathiswa Magwa nishe utshilo .

Abantu baseMpuma Koloni baza kutha tha inxaxheba kwica ndelo lezilwanyana zasendle emva kokuba befumene ima-li kurhulumente yokuqalisa umyezo wezilwanyana zasendle oza kuba ngowoluntu.
Indawo yaseDouble Drift cebu kuhle eRhini inabantu aba li-1 500 abaphuma kumakhaya angama-264. Basuswa kumhlaba wabo ngurhulumente wase Ciskei ngowe-1991, kusenzelwa umyezo wezilwanyana zasendle wabantu abamhlophe.
Abantu balapha basanda kufumana iitayitile zalo mhlaba, obuyiselwe kubo ngenkqubo karhulumente yokubuyiswa komhlaba.
Ngokokutsho kweNkulumbuso yaseMpuma Koloni uPhumu lo Masualle, kubekelwe bucala imali ezizigidi ezingama-21 zee randi ukulungisela ukuthenga lo mhlaba kwaye uza kunikezelwa ebantwini ngezigaba ezahlu-keneyo.
"Eli linyathelo elibalulekileyo kumalinge olondolozo nawokuzisa iinguqu. Lo myezo wezilwa nyana zasendle uyalungiswa ukuze ube kumgangatho apho uza kukwazi ukukhuphisana neminye imiyezo yezilwanyana kwaye norhulumente uluxhasa ngemali, izilwanyana zasendle kunye noqeqesho uluntu lwa-lapha," utshilo uMasualle.
Abantu balapha, abawulawula kunye ne-Arhente yezoKhe nketho nemiYezo eMpuma Kolo ni (i-ECPTA) lo myezo phantsi kweLikhayalethu Community Property Association (i-LCPA), bafumene imali ezizigidi zee randi ezithandathu kwiSebe lezeNdalo yokuba baqalise ishi shini ngezilwanyana zasendle kulo myezo, uzihekthare ezili 1 400 ubukhulu, bawuthenge-lwe iSebe lezokuPhuhliswa kwamaPhandle noBuyekezo lwemiHlaba.
Usihlalo we-LCPA, uMxolisi Ngesi, uthi abantu balapha bafaka isicelo sokubuyiselwa umhla ba ngowe-1998. Ngowe-2012, baye banikwa umhlaba ozihe kthare ezingama-23 500 ekungo ku nje othe waphinda wonge zwa ngomyezo wezilwanyana zasendle ozihekthare ezili-1 400.
"Sivuya kakhulu kuba siyifumene yonke into ebesiyifu na. Urhulumente usincedise nangemali yokwakha iziseko zophuhliso. Sinazo izilwanyana zasendle, eziquka amaqwa rhashe ali-10, amaxhama ali-15 neempofu ezili-10," utshilo uNgesi, esongeza nokuba kuza kuthengwa iinyathi nee-impala kungekudala.
Uphinde wongeza ngelokuba abantu balapha bafumana uqeqesho kwi-ECPTA ngeendlela zokulawula nokuphatha umye zo wezilwanyana zasendle. "Izicwangciso zethu kukwakha ii-lodge ezimbini kodwa ngoku sele sisakha iindawo zokuhlala oonogada balo myezo kunye nobuhlanti bokothulela izilwa nyana ezifikayo," utshilo uNgesi.
"Ngethuba kubiywa ucingo kwindawo ezikhilomitha ezingama-10 kunye nesango lokungena, kudalelwe abantu abalapha izithuba zemisebenzi ezingama-61," utshilo uMphathiswa wezeNdalo u-Ednah Molewa ngethuba lo myezo uni kezelwa ngokusesikweni.

title: Amathuba owafumana ebomini, wasebenzise
author: Amukelani Chauke
text:
INkqubo yokuXhasa noku Phuhlisa amaFama incede abantu abatsha abafana  noWayne Mansfield (one minyaka engama-33 ubudala) wasePaarl, osuke ekubeni ngu mthengisi wasesitalatweni osebenzela utatomncinci wa khe eMarikeni yaseKapa xa kuvalwe izikolo waya ekube ni ngusomashishini othume la kumazwe angaphandle iilamuni azilima ngokwakhe kumhlaba awuqeshileyo.
Kwisithuba seminyaka eli shumi edlulileyo, uMansfield engusomashishini osakhasayo oneminyaka engama-23 ubu dala, zange asithathe isithuba somsebenzi awayesifumana kwifama awayethenga kuyo iilamuni awayezithengisa ngelo xesha. Isizathu sakhe yayikukuba ngelo xesha waye ngenamdla kwinto yokuba ngu mfama.
Kodwa ekuhambeni kwemi nyaka, oku kwaye kwatshi ntsha xa ebona indlela iilamu ni ezithengwa ngayo.  "Ndaqaphela ukuba amafa ma nawo enza le nto nathi bathengisi basesitalatweni sasiyenza ayezipakishela iimveliso zawo aze aye kuzi thengisa emarikeni yaseKapa.
Ndaye ndaqonda ukuba thina njengabathengisi basesitala tweni siza kungabi nabantu siza kubathengisela.
Malunga nonyaka wama2013, umfama walengi ngqi wavuma ukuba afundise uMansfield onke amaqhinga okuba ngumfama waza wamni ka umhlaba ozihektare ezili-12 ukuba awuqeshe. Waya wa faka nemibhobho yokunkce nkceshela into leyo yanceda uMansfield watsho wakwazi ukulima.
Ngowama-2015, wakwazi ukuthumela kumazwe anga phandle umthwalo weelamuni ozitoni ezingama-31. Ngonya ka olandelayo, ngowama-2016, umthamo wenyuka waya ku tsho kwiitoni ezili-168.
Oku kwenzeka ngenxa yoku fundiswa nokuqeqeshwa ngu makhwekhwetha kunye  nangoncedo awalifumana kwiNkqubo yokuXhasa noku Phuhlisa amaFama into leyo yamenza wafumana isibone lelo-mali seNkqubo eBanzi yokuXha sa ezoLi mo (i-CASP) ngowama-2015.
Esi sibonelelo-mali samnceda kakhulu watsho wazinza futhi nefama yakhe yakhula.
Ukuxhobisa Amafama NgezakhonoINkqubo yokuXhasa nokuPhuhlisa amaFama ilungiselelwe ukuxhobisa ngezakhono abantu ababehlelelekile ngaphambili, ingakumbi abo baxhamla kwinkqubo karhulumente yokuBuyiswa kwemiHlaba.
Inceda amafama asakhasayo, lawo alimela ukuzondla wona neentsapho zawo, lawo aneefama ezincinci kunye nalawo arhwebayo.Umlawuli weeprojekthi wecandelo lenkxaso yophuhliso lwezolimo kwiSebe lezoLimo laseNtshona Koloni uShaheed Martin uthi le nkqubo incede amafama atsho akwazi uku zimela.
"Sinceda amafama esaqala.
Oku kuthetha ukuba siyawanceda nangenkqubo yokufaka isicelo sesibonelelo-mali aze athi zakuba izicelo zawo zivunyiwe, siwancede aqalise ukulima nokuvelisa," ucacise watsho.
Ucacisile nokuba indlela esetyenziswa lisebe ijonga zonke iimfuno zomfama ize incedise ngeenkonzo zenkxaso ezigcweleyo, eziquka ukuncedisa nangeziseko ezingundoqo.
"Sinazo neengcali ngezoqoqo sho zona ezithi zincede amafama ukuwakhangelisa iindawo anokuthengisa kuzo iimveliso zawo xa sele emile," wongeze watsho.

title: I-NHI yinkqubo yeenkonzo zempilo engcono kakhulu
author: vukuzenzele unnamed
text:
UGq Motsoaledi ebethe tha kutsha nje kwintla nganiso nonoondaba apho ebenika iinkcukacha ezi gcweleyo ngoMthetho-sihlo melo oYilwayo we-NHI kunye noMthetho-sihlomelo oyiLwa yo weziKimu zezoNyango.
Le Mithetho iYilwayo inga maqalela amalinge okulu ngiselela ukuba abantu  abaninzi bafumane iinkonzo zonyango nge-NHI.
Umthetho oyilwayo ngu mthetho ongekagqitywa  osafuna ukugqithiswa kuwo onke amanqanaba okwenzi wa komthetho. ImiThetho eYilwayo emininzi ibhalwa lisebe likarhulumente, isebe elo likhokelwa ngumphathi swa walo. UMthetho oYilwayo kufuneka uvunywe yiKha bhinethi phambi kokuba unge niswe ePalamente.
Ukungeniswa kwale mi Thetho iYilwayo mibini ku thetha ukuba uMzantsi Afri ka sele kumbovu ukuba ube nenkqubo yeenkonzo zempilo zomntu wonke, into leyo ethe tha ukuba i-NHI iza kuba ngu mthetho kungekudala.
I-NHI yinkqubo yokuncedi sa efana nengxowa-mali. Le nkqubo iza kuqinisekisa uku ba bonke abemi boMzantsi Afrika bayazifumana iinko nzo zempilo ezibalukeleki leyo, nokuba umntu usebenza phi na okanye akanayo imali yokubhatala i-NHI.
UGq Motsoaledi uthi urhulu mente uyayazi ukuba abanye abantu bakholelwa ekubeni akufuneki kuthethwe noku thethwa nge-NHI, ingeka lungiswa inkqubo karhulu -mente yezempilo ekwisimo esimaxongo kuqala.
Uthi urhulumente uyazazi iingxaki zeenkonzo zempi lo ezingekho mgangathweni nezisokolekayo ukuba zifu nyanwe kumaziko ezempilo karhulumente.
UGq Motsoaledi uthi iSi cwangciso soPhuhliso seSi zwe (i-NDP)  saphawula  ukuba ikhona ingxaki kwi inkonzo zempilo kumaziko karhulumente kwaye ngo kuqalisa inkqubo ye-NHI kuza kulungiswa ingxa ki yeenkonzo zempilo ezi ngekho mgangathweni ku maziko karhulumente kunye neyeendleko eziphezulu ku maziko abucala.
Nangona izilungiso kule mi Thetho iYilwayo zisagwadlwa, isebe liza kuqalisa ngeeproje kthi ze-NHI ezine ubuncinane.
Ezi projekthi ziquka iinkonzo zempilo ezikolweni, iinko nzo zempilo zabaphazamiseke engqondweni, iinkonzo zempi lo zoomama abakhulelweyo abaneengxaki ngezisu zabo kwizibhedlela ezichapha zeleke kakhulu ezingama-22 kunye neoncology . Nangona nje nawo amanye amaphondo eza kuhoywa, kodwa ezi pro jekthi ziza kugxininisa kakhu lu kwiphondo laKwaZulu-Na tal nelaseGauteng.
UGq Motsoaledi uphinde wongeza wathi imali ebi zwa ngamaziko onyango abucala ayifikeleki kube -mi beli abaninzi, kanga ngokuba kutyunjwe lowo wayesakuba yiJaji eyiNtloko uSandile Ngcobo yiKomishi ni yezoKhuphiswano ukuba aqhube uphando ngeendleko zempilo kumaziko onyango abucala.
Ezi zilungiso ziza kuqaliswa ziza kunceda kakhulu aba ntu abagulayo abasengxakini yokungabi namali.
UGq Motsoaledi uthi isilu ngiso sokuqala kulo Mthetho uYilwayo siza kubhangisa le nkqubo isetyenziswayo ngo ku yokuba abantu kufuneka bongeze imali kule ibhatalwa zizikimu zonyango zabucala.
Ukongeza intlawulo ngaphe zu kwale ihlawulwa zizikimu zonyango zabucala kuthetha ukuba isikimu sezonyango sibhatala isixa esithile, oko kukuthi, asiyibhatali yonke le mali ibizwe ngugqirha okanye sisibhedlela sabucala, ize ima li eshiyekileyo ibhatalwe ngu mntu lowo ugulayo.

title: Imisebenzi ye-Ofisi kaZwelonke yokuQwalasela iziCelo yowama-2018
author: vukuzenzele unnamed
text:
abafundi abafanelekileyo abaqala kwiZinga leMfundo ePhakamileyo noQeqesho (i-PSET) abafuna uncedo ngale miba ilandelayo:

Abo bafake isicelo sokufunda kwangethuba kwiziko lemfundo abalithandayo saze isicelo sabo asaphumelela ke ngoku sele bedlulelwe lixesha ukuba bangafaka isicelo kwamanye amaziko.
Abo bangakhange bafake zicelo kuba bengawafumenanga la manqaku afunwayo kwiBanga 11 ukuze umntu athathwe.
Abo bangakhange bafake sicelo ngexesha ngenxa yezizathu ezahlukeneyo okanye khange bafake sicelo kwaphela.
Aba bangayaziyo ukuba baza kufundela eliphi ikhondo.
Abo bayaziyo into abayifundelayo qha bengaqinisekanga ukuba eli khondo balithandayo libalungele na.

Iinkonzo ezinikezelwa yi-CACH
Izicelo zokufuna indawo zokufunda kwizinga le-PSET (iidyunivesiti, iidyunivesiti zezobuchwepheshe, iikholeji zemfundo noqeqesho lobugcisa nobuchule (ii-TVET) kunye namaQumrhu amaCandelo eMfundo noQeqesho (ii-SETA)
Ulwazi ngeendawo ezinceda ngemali yokufunda (Inkcukacha nge-NSFAS)
Iinkonzo zengcebiso ngamakhondo (iingcebiso, ulwazi, ukuboniswa nokucetyiswa ngamakhondo/ulwazi

ngeendawo ezinceda ngemali yokufunda, kunye neentlobo ezahlukeneyo zemali yokufunda).
Ukuxhasa amagcisa (Iziko leSizwe lokuXhasa uPhuhliso lwamaGcisa).

I-CACH ivula ngomhla wesi-3 kweyoMqungu, isithutyana nje emva kokuba iziphumo zeemviwo zeBanga 12 zikhutshiwe kwaye iza kuvula kude kuye ekupheleni kweyoMdumba ngowama-2018.

I-CACH isebenza njani?
Inqanaba 1: Abafundi abangayifumenanga indawo yokufunda kumaziko emfundo ephakamileyo ebebefake kuwo izicelo, okanye abo bafuna indawo yokufunda kwii-PSETA, bangaqhagamshelana ne-CACH kule nombolo ingahlawulewayo: 0800 356 635, kwiwebhusayithi (www.dhet.gov.za)
okanye ngokuthumela i-SMS (igama kunye neNombolo yeSazisi ku-49200) okanye bangabhalisa ngokungena ku-intanethi. Ungafumana ezinye iinkcukacha ku- Facebook (CACH_SA).

Inqanaba 2: Umsebenzi we-CACH uza kumtsalela umnxeba umfundi lowo, kwiziko lemibuzo aze ambhalise kuluhlu lwe-CACH, enika iinkcukacha ngekhondo elikhethwe ngulo mfundi kunye nephondo abafuna ukufunda kulo.

Inqanaba 3: Iinkcukacha zomfaki-sicelo kunye neziphumo zakhe zeBanga 12 ziyaqinisekiswa zize zizithumele zona ngokwazo kumaziko emfundo ephakamileyo ngeenjongo zokukhangela ukuba umfundi

lowo angayifumana na indawo yokufunda futhi athathwe.

Inqanaba 4: I-CACH iza kuqinisekisa iinkcukacha zomfundi ize izithumele kumaziko emfundo asenazo iindawo zokufunda. Amaziko aseneendawo zokufunda kwaye nomfundi lowo enazo ezi zinto zifunwayo, iziko lemfundo elo liza
kuqhagamshelana nomfundi ngqo ngokwalo.

Izinto ekufuneka ziqatshelwe
I-CACH ayizibopheleli ithi umfaki-sicelo uza kuyifumana indawo yokufunda.
I-CACH ayinakuxelela iziko lemfundo ukuba maliqhagamshelane nini na nomfaki- sicelo.

Ingaba i-CACH ibanceda njani abafaki-zicelo abangaqinisekanga ngekhondo abafuna ukulifundela okanye abangenazo ezi zinto zifunwayo ukuze umntu afunde kwizinga le-PSET?
I-CACH isebenzisana neZiko leSizwe leeNkonzo zamaKhondo (i-CSD) lona elinceda abantu ngolwazi olugcweleyo malunga:
Namakhondo ahlukeneyo.
Izifundo ekufuneka zikhethwe.
Ulwazi ngemviwo zoxabangelo
Ukuphucula amanqaku eBanga 12
Indawo zokufunda ezikhoyo kwizinga le-PSET.
Imali yokufunda kunye neentlobo zayo.
Ulwazi ngenkqubo yokufaka izicelo kunye nemihla yokugqibela yokufaka izicelo.
Ukufaka isicelo sekota yesibini kunye nemihla yokubhalisa.
Naye nabani na onomdla kwiinkonzo ezifumaneka kwi-CSD angaqhagamshelana neZiko leMibuzo le-CSD ngokusebenzisa ezi zixhobo zilandelayo:
Thumela nge-SMS umbuzo wakho okanye thumela u-“please call me” ku:
072 204 5056, okanye

086 999 0123, eyinombolo esetyenziswa ngabantu abaninzi, ukusuka ngoMvulo ukuya ngoLwesihlanu phakathi kwentsimbi ye-8:00 kusasa no-4:30 emva kwemini,
I-imeyile: careerhelp@dhet.gov.za

123 Francis Baard Street, ePitoli.

Imali yokufunda ephuma kurhulumente
Kukho iintlobo ezahlukeneyo zemali yokufunda kumaziko emfundo ephakamileyo ezikhutshwa yi-Funza Lushaka Bursary Scheme, IsiKimu seSizwe sokuNceda Abafundi ngeMali yokuFunda (i-NSFAS), iNkqubo yokuNceda Abantwana baseMaphandleni ngeMali yokuFunda, iSebe loPhuhliso loLuntu, iSebe lezobuNzululwazi nobuChwepheshe kunye neSebe lezeMpilo.

Ngubani onokufaka isicelo semali yokufunda?
Abafundi baseMzantsi Afrika abafuna ukufunda kumaziko emfundo ephakamileyo bayacelwa ukuba baye kwi-Ofisi yeMali yoNcedo ngokuFunda kwiziko abalithandayo.

title: Abantwana abahluthiyo baqhuba kakuhle kwizifundo zabo
author: More Matshediso
text:
kwizikolo zikarhulumente eMzantsi Afrika banakho ngoku ukwenza umsebenzi wabo wesikolo. Oku kwe- nzeka ngenxa yenkqubo ka- rhulumente eqinisekisa uku- ba bafumana ukutya oku- nezakha-mzimba.
ISebe leMfundo esiSise-
ko (i-DBE), lisebenzisa iNkqubo kaRhulumente yo kuTyis a A bantwana Ezikolweni (i-NSNP), lifike legqithisa kwinjongo ebe- lizibekele yona yokubone- lela ngokutya abantwana besikolo abamalunga nama- 75% kweli lizwe.
Umlawuli we-NSNP ese-
beni, uNeo Rakwena, uthi izikolo ezingama-20 619 ziphekela zize ziphakele abantwana besikolo abazi-
9 032 622 ngosuku kulo lonke eli.
Uthi izikolo ezingaxha- mliyo kule nkqubo kufune- ka ziye kwii-ofisi zesithili ukuba nazo zifuna ukuba yinxalenye yale nkqubo.
Ngonyaka-mali wama- 2015/16, imali emalunga neebhiliyoni zeerandi ezi- yi-5 703 yaye yabekelwa bu- cala ukulungiselela i-NSNP.
URakwena uthi le mali i c hi th w a ku l e n kqu bo iyongezwa rhoqo ngonya- ka kulungiselelwa umba wokunyuka kwamaxabi- so ezinto, ke ngoko imali ebekelwe i-NSNP yowa- ma-2017/18 imalunga nee- bhiliyoni eziyi-6.4 zeerandi. I-NSNP ilicebo lexesha eli-
futshane lokugxotha ikati
